title: Social.mom - Meet Moms Nearby with Kids & Babies
description:
For mothers, expecting mothers and TTC only.

Meeting other moms from your neighborhood is easier than ever. Social.mom is a social network for moms only where you can be yourself, talk about real stuff, have fun and relax.

Social.mom’s features include:

* Meet other local moms and expecting mothers
* Connect with other great moms like you and build a local community
* Share photos and updates to help other moms know about your life
* Find activities with local moms and your families, and make plans to meet
* Get notifications when friends love and comment on your posts
* Find mothers from your area with children the same age as yours
* Discuss motherhood’s ups and downs with other moms
* Strengthen your local community and make new friends
* Help other moms and be helped by your Social.mom’s community
* Find local deals

Do you have questions? Contact Audrey (Social.mom’s founder) audrey@social.mom

Social.mom was made for moms only. You are a man and would like to connect with other dads? Tell David: https://social.mom/en/dads

recentChanges:
Check out the new look for Social.Mom! We have made some design updates we think you are really going to enjoy. Keep an eye out as we continue to improve the app.

Keep letting us know what you think by reaching out to hello@social.mom
comments: This is a good app but honestly the messaging system sucks, it would be better if the messages would pop up kinda like Facebook messenger. And I wish I could tag my friends in stuff. All in all it's a good app to find mom friends on. Those are the only things I don't like but I'm keeping the app!

I downloaded the app but I'm unable to activate my account because I'm not receiving the activation code sent to my mobile number. I've tried several times. I'm very disappointed I could really use this app

I forgot about this app after resetting my phone. But I tried to log in today and I cannot remember my password, so I tried to have a password reset emailed to me, but I am not getting anything; I tried five times. And I cannot make a new account because I HAVE to give my cellphone number and I already used it for my last account. Ridiculous.

The app works well no trouble with it. The mom's on here do seam a little nicer than other on other sites and there is a lot less drama. Honestly, what I really don't like that it seems to be nothing but mom's just posting selfies. I was hoping for more than moms just trying to get other mom to tell them they look cute.

This is an awesome app.This husband and wife team are angels sent from heaven ..in my opinion.Im 47 looking for my bff..they offer me a great..safe..fun way to make new friends.Im shy so this is a great way for me to meet sonebody first. Thank you to the makers of this app..you are a godsend..bless you both !!

title: Peeks Social
description: Peeks Social is a live-streaming enabled social network with crowd funding and peer-to-peer payments.
descriptionHTML: Peeks Social is a live-streaming enabled social network with crowd funding and peer-to-peer payments.
summary: Download now & share peeks into your world
developerAddress:
181 University Ave, 20th Floor
Toronto, Ontario
M5H 3M7
recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: This app is a scam. Theres no way to call them if you have any concerns about your account and their email just send you generic answers that avoid your question. I raised over $300 on peeks and i tried to withdrawl it back in may of 2019. Its january 2020 and i still havent recieved any of it. I told them i would pursue legal action and they didnt respond to my email. Theyre stealing money!! Beware!!!

Great idea and a good app, it has potential and I will keep using it to stream. The opportunity to make money is there. I don't have many followers and I made a few hundred bucks already...imagine if I had a couple thousand followers?! $$$

As a broadcaster, I both love and hate this app. I haven't been paid since May, and that took several months to get. They say 40-50 days..... Their math is obviously bad. I love my fans and I have several of them 8.4k. But I quit sex work and started working a regular 9-5, so I would actually get paid. Sorry fans🤷

They need to pay their streamers more often, and introduce a setting to allow us to record our own streams to storage. Not allowing viewers to screenshot streams is great. Work on those two items and this is a pretty solid app.

Since the latest updates, released this week, (that were supposed to "fix crashes" but not quite), all new live streams appear pixelated and without color. Upon replay, new streams begin the same way, for seconds, before displaying correctly. The pixelation pattern appears to match the warning text that is shown before entering each stream. However, this experience may be limited to viewing streams of iPhone users from my Android.

title: Vero - True Social
description:
Vero is a new kind of Social Network.

We don’t use algorithms to keep you clicking. We just want you to click with each other.

That means no ads, no data mining, and total control over your privacy. Whether your next post is seen by friends, followers, or a mix of both is up to you.

As well as a range of features to help your social media feel like social life, our rule of thumb (or thumbs) is quality time, not quantity.

That’s probably why we were the most-downloaded app around the world this year. Featured as Best New App in over 100 countries.
Download now and get Vero free for life.

We send you an SMS during registration to verify your phone number. Please have your phone nearby.

Features:
100% Chronological Feed
No Data Mining
No Ads. No Algorithms
Own your own Content
Share Photos, Videos, Links, Music, Movies, TV Shows, Books, and Places
Direct message with your Connections
• Easily Select Your Audience For Each Post
• Easily Search Everything That's Ever Been Shared With You
• Recommendations From Those You Trust 
• Track Time Spent In-App
• Original Content From Our Creative Partners

*Named by Apple in their ‘Best New Apps’ category within 159 countries, September 2015. 

Questions, concerns or feedback? Get in touch. 
Email support@vero.co

comments: As someone tired of of social media as a whole, I really wanted this app to work. It had so much potential but after almost 2 yrs, I've pretty much all but forgotten about it. No one I know uses it, I can't find new people since you can't easily browse anyone else. What's the point? Also hate how extremely limited posting any entertainment interests is...we should be able to type in whatever band/movie/book & not choose through the extreme limitations in the database that never has anything.

I first got into the app because my friend recommend it to me. But it was so overwhelming. I find it hard to start on the app and doesn't has a feel as a social media app. I looked up vero...and if you are going to make a good name. Make sure this is the Vero is what people looking for. Not sum app that also pays. I recommend to not add confusing features that may stick out "USELESS" but since I have good feelings about this app. I could prolly collaborate on it.

It's so obvious that a lead dev executive is missing behind this platform. - Bad user experience. I have to select hashtag tab instead of searching for hashtag in any search area (lazy devs) - I can't discover other people / new posts from unknown - I can't make friends as most people are not active - No meme & fan pages - The love/like button tap box is difficult to touch - How do I even chat!? Seems difficult to do so - If it was a paid app I would ask for a refund

This is a very good app & feels like a more professional take on Soical Media without it being a bit dull like LinkedIn or Facebook! I was introduced to this by my mate Mason, i got on to it pretty much immediately. Would definitely recommend to a friend & I in fact have done! 10/10 5/5: ☆☆☆☆☆

No rating yet will change once i can see what the app is like cant see what the app is like bc i put all my info in get to the point where thwy twll me im going to recieve a number i guess texted or emailed to me a code of 4/number verification code to enter to complete setup but i never gwt the code sent ro me and im adding all my correct information

title: Vent - Express yourself freely
description:
Vent is like a social diary, a place for you to express how you REALLY feel.  

Vent helps you connect to a fun, uplifting, positive, and understanding community, making it easy to share your feelings with people around the world and lift your mood! 

On Vent, you’re never alone. Our whole community is just waiting to hear what you have to say.  Join now and discover how much you have in common with… well, everybody!

-  Express your true self with our broad range of emotions and colors!
-  React to other people’s vents using our special response buttons
-  Our community understands what you’re going through and will provide support 24/7
-  Make friends and chat privately in real-time without sharing personal contact information
-  Join Groups to connect with other people that share similar interests and experiences 

What are you waiting for? Express yourself with Vent now and feel better for it!

comments: My favorite app, but frequent bugs. :( Right now, I cannot interact with others posts or even my own. I can make a vent post in itself, but cannot react to others vents or leave comments. It's been going on for a few days now, and there's no update I am waiting for 😭please fix, I would love to rate this app 5☆ it is my favorite app. It just goes through so many bugs!!

Great app, seriously helped me with serious issues I had built up, but I want to say that I had vent on my old phone but when i got my new phone I had to make a new account but when I put in my Gmail name it said that it was already registered so I can't post on my new account so it's pretty much useless :/
friendly community, tons of emotions to pick from(and a ton of free ones each month so you don't need to pay £2.99 for all of them per month)

Been loving this app and using it religiously, however i recently updated it a few days ago and now it won't open... just shows a screen saying loading :/ i don't want to have to create a whole new account just because I updated the app

I absolutely love this app. I've had it for almost three years now. It's really helped me out at a time I literally needed to vent. It's really easy to figure out when you first start off. & if you have a question about the app, there are always kind people to answer. The community is great. It's a great way to relate to others & get support & advice. I do miss being able to use kin for the other emotions though. Sometimes I feel like some of my vents don't really fit some of the emotions.

title: Snapchat
description:
Snapchat is a fast and fun way to share the moment with friends and family 👻

Snapchat opens right to the camera, so you can send a Snap in seconds! Just take a photo or video, add a caption, and send it to your best friends and family. Express yourself with Filters, Lenses, Bitmojis, and all kinds of fun effects.

SNAP 📸
• Snapchat opens right to the camera. Tap to take a photo, or press and hold for video.
• Add a Lens or Filter to your photo — new ones are added every day! Change the way you look, dance with your 3D Bitmoji, and discover games you can play with your face.
• Create your own Filters to add to photos and videos — or try out Lenses made by our community!

CHAT 💬
• Stay in touch and Chat with friends with live messaging, or share your day with Group Stories.
• Video Chat with up to 16 friends at once. You can even use Filters and Lenses!
• Express yourself with Friendmojis — exclusive Bitmojis made just for you and a friend.

DISCOVER 🔍
• Follow friends and watch their Stories to see their day unfold.
• Keep up to date with exclusive Stories from top publishers and creators.
• Watch breaking news, original Shows, and community Stories — made just for your phone.

SNAP MAP 🗺
• See where your friends are hanging out, if they’ve shared their location with you.
• Share your location with your best friends, or go off the grid with Ghost Mode.
• Discover live Stories from the community nearby, or across the world!

MEMORIES 🎞️
• Look back on Snaps you’ve saved with free cloud storage.
• Edit and send old moments to friends, or save them to your Camera Roll.
• Create Stories from your favorite memories to share with friends and family.

FRIENDSHIP PROFILE 👥
• Every friendship has its own special profile to see the moments you’ve saved together.
• Discover new things you have in common with Charms. See how long you’ve been friends, your astrological compatibility, your Bitmojis’ fashion sense, and more!
• Friendship Profiles are just between you and a friend, so you can bond over what makes your friendship special.

Happy Snapping!

• • •

Please note: Snapchatters can always capture or save your messages by taking a screenshot, using a camera, or otherwise. Be mindful of what you Snap!

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements! 👻
comments: Great app, simple to use, and the best way to communicate with my friends and family. One of my favorite features is the snap map, where you can see publicly posted stories from whatever region you want. There are many useful settings and features, like having a private story that only specific people can see, having group chats, and choosing who can see your location on the map. There is also a discover section if you are bored and want to watch something.

Overall the app is nice but when I let someone try to log into their account on my phone it keeps saying "Oops something went wrong. Please try again later". Now I'm unable to login as I get the same message and when I try to change password, it says the same thing. This is very obnoxious and irritating and needs to be fixed. My WiFi is fine and I've been able to logout and back in previously but now it doesn't work.

My BFF forced me onto using this app, and im glad she did because it is so amazing! It lets you play games with your friends while you can still communicate with each other! You can use different filters while on a video call, and take a screenshot to save the moment when the two of you are using the same filter! I also found a lot of my other friends on this app. I convinced all of my friends who were not on the app to join too! So you should totally install this app and have your BFF do it too

Yes I gave snapchat 1 star. My account got logged out of and now it's not letting me log back in, when I went to change my password it said that something went wrong as I went to submit a new one. This is extremely upsetting and frustrating because I have a ton of photos and videos in my memories which I do not have on my phone that I do not want to lose. Snapchat I get that you keep updating because you think you're fixing bugs but really you just keep adding more and more. I'm dissatisfied.

Account disfunction I logged out of my account and when I tried to log back in it says that something went wrong. I have wifi and service. When I asked my friend if it let her log into her account she had the same problem. We both tried to change our password because we thought that was the problem but it wouldn't even let us change the password. So we both had to make new accounts and we lost all of our pictures in our memories and our streaks. Can you guys please fix this!?

title: Yubo - Make new friends
description:
Yubo is a social video live-streaming app to find new friends, chat with people just like you, and build a social community based on YOUR interests! Friendship is going live on Yubo!

1/ STREAM: Go live and stream videos with friends! You can start a live video chat with up to 10 people, and even invite new friends to join you. Sing, dance, talk about your day or play a game - you can do it all on Yubo.

2/ CHAT: Use the chat feature to say hi to new friends, and reconnect with old ones. You never know who you’ll meet on Yubo!

3/ SWIPE: Find new people nearby AND from all around the world in seconds, with a swipe of your finger.

4/️‍️ FIND A COMMUNITY: Are you into beauty, sports, music, travel or LGBTQ+? There are friends all over the world for you! Discover and connect with the perfect community, full of people who share your interests. 

5/ SHARE: Earn rewards for inviting your friends to join Yubo on Snapchat and other social apps. 

Why choose Yubo?

- Yubo is the best place to make new friends, find a community, and share your world - LIVE.
- Over 25 million people have already signed up for Yubo to start making new friends, so you’ll never be alone!
- New games, tools, and updates every month - and we’re always listening to suggestions.

Ready to go live? Download Yubo and start making friends now. We can’t wait to meet you!

You can find our Privacy Policy at https://yubo.live/legal/privacy and Terms of Service at https://yubo.live/legal/terms

Yubo is free to download and use. However, we also offer an optional subscription package (Power Pack). 
Questions? Suggestions? We love receiving feedback from the Yubo community, and use it to make our app a better place!

You can contact us at support@yubo.live or directly message us on Instagram @yubo_App!

developerAddress: 8 rue de charonne  75011 Paris
recentChanges:
Today we are introducing 3 new cool features!
---> Add Tags to your profile to share your interests!
---> Screen sharing: Now you can share your screen during a live streaming session and show your favorite apps and games to your friends.
Happy friending!
---> Raise your hand: We made it easier to ask to join a live broadcast by clicking on the Raise your hand button.
We hope you will enjoy this new version!
Team Yubo
comments: A great app and I can communicate with people untill it begins to lag. Sometimes I can watch lives but not join, sometimes everyones video will disappear leaving just their icons however the other people on the live can see the videos it's just me who can't. Also sometimes I can't comment/the comments will freeze and not load anymore. The worst is where I cannot join. I request and my request is accepted yet nothing happenes and I cannot join at all. Also it disconnects and removes me from live.

I have used Yubo on and off for quite a while now. It was always one of those apps that while rough, could improve alot with time. I take that back. For every one good addition, like tags, about 5 worse additions get added. I get it, an app needs money to stay afloat. But when now it features a limited swipe, which sometimes bugs out and resets multiple times. It's a really sour addition that ruins the experience honestly.

This app is like a mix between Bigo/MeetMe & Tinder, but is like a pay to win game. You seriously have to pay to see who swiped on you, and to re-swipe someone, you ALSO have to pay to swipe for an unlimited time, which is a new feature, so it looks like the Yubo team is getting desperate for money. It would also be nice to put in where you live so you can match with people that are in the same place or very near. Yubo team, please make it to where you can see who swiped on you.

Man, it's like you guys are trying your damn best to get as many people off your platform as possible. Sure you're getting a few extra pennies, but a swipe limit and all these annoying boosts are really just so intrusive and annoying. Everytime I hop on it's like "yo these people swiped yes on you, give us money and we'll tell you who they are." The entire quality of the app and general concept of helping people make friends has been flushed down the drain in order to get a quick buck.

Still giving this 2 stars because it did help me get a few friends, but recently they added this feature where you have to share Yubo to your Snapchat friends, and if you don't, you can only swipe a dozen times every 15 minutes. This is by far the worst thing they could've done, and I'm gonna uninstall this app as soon as I get all my friends from Yubo on another social media. Don't install this app, it used to be good, but now it sucks.

title: IMVU - Create 3D Avatar and make real friends
description:
IMVU is a 3D avatar-based social experience with the largest 3D world and catalog to customize your look and meet new people. Chat with friends, roleplay and join a virtual world with millions of others for free!

IMVU is a virtual world simulator game and social chat. More than a life simulation, it’s a virtual life unto itself, where you can enter a 3D world with your avatar and choose your life as you want it to be.

Customize a 3D avatar, personalize your own animated emoji and message friends! Your dream life, love life and virtual life await in IMVU!

AVATAR CREATION
- Choose your life and customize yourself.
- 3D avatar creator lets you design yourself from top to bottom.
- Role play your virtual life however you desire - get weird, get wild, it’s all you!
- Avatar looks can change to match your style - shop without limits!

CHAT IN 3D
- Chat with friends from all over the world!
- Chat lobby lets you connect with players near and far.
- Avatar chat gives you full conversations that are more than instant messages.

EXPRESS YOURSELF, AS YOURSELF
- Chat with friends using your personal animated WithMoji.
- Online social game for you and your friends to enjoy.

YOUR VIRTUAL LIFE
- The avatar life is your life, make it what you want it to be!
- Want a love story? IMVU can be a dating simulator for your avatar’s love life.
- Role play and chat with friends to create an amazing story.

GET SOCIAL AND SHARE YOUR #MOOD
- While chatting, you can pose, add filters, and post photos to get people talking.
- Virtual chat with a range of emotes, emoji and functions

Your virtual world and virtual life await in the IMVU free app! Join today and make your avatar! 

For 3D avatar chat rooms on older devices, please follow the steps below. Please keep in mind that your experience may not be optimal.

• Tap the main navigator in the top left corner
• Tap Graphics Options
• Tap “Full 3D”

Then enter your favorite chat room and experience 3D!

comments: I love this game so much but I have realised that I can't always get the items I want from the shop because of the lack of credits. I understand the offers and surveys are there but they don't work for me and it is really sad. I know the IMVU Team are hard working but if you could add a work feature that allows us to earn credits like in other games like Avakin, you can keep and get more players. This is just a suggestion. I just want to be able to buy things without using real money.

i wanted to log in to my IMVU account . i entered the RIGHT email address & password & it says that it was wrong . i tried many times & it was still the same . so i decided to create another account , it took too long to load in . so i gave up . & when i tried to log in it says that the gmail was already in used . please like do something !! im so frustrated & disappointed .

Wow im kicked back out of my account again. Now its saying, my internet connection not working. There is nothing wrong with my internet connection. Yall need to fix these bugs and stop updating. I changed my password three times and its the same. Then it says invalid password or email. My email is correct and so is my password. Update its back up

I love this game, its super fun to play! I met a lot of people. But, I tried to log in into my account, It said too many attempts even though I tried only ONCE. Also, when I tried to delete my account it would take me to the log in thing and it would say that my password is wrong. This is an amazing app because it allows you to connect with all kinds of people,and learn things or languages from talking to people. So it is amazing to connect with people I know even though I can't see them it is really good. Plus I've made online friends and in reality it feels different when people bug you unlike the game, and people will wait on you while your doing something.

title: Twitter
description:
Join the conversation! Twitter is your go-to social networking app and the source for what's happening in the world. From world news to local news, entertainment to sports and gaming, politics to fun stories that go viral, when it happens in the world, it happens on Twitter first. Find friends or follow influential people - every voice can impact the world! Join over 2 BILLION users worldwide!

Tweet, Retweet, Reply to Tweets, Share or Like - Twitter is Easy to Use
Chat privately or go big and initiate a group conversation with anyone who follows you. Track your friends & other Twitter followers or follow your favorite celebrity alongside hundreds of interesting Twitter users, to read their content at a glance. Engage your social network with noteworthy links, photos and videos. Discover which of your Tweets were liked or Retweeted.

Create your Free Twitter account Today!
Twitter allows you to find interesting people or build a following of people who are interested in you. Maintaining a social connection has never been easier!Twitter allows celebs to build a personal connection with their fans. This is why Twitter has become one of the most used social media platforms in the world.

Build an Engaging Profile
Customize your profile, add a photo, description, location, and background photo
Tweet often and optimize your posting times
Post visual content
Use hashtags in your tweets 
Draw in followers outside of Twitter

Know What’s Trending Now
Discover top trending hashtags and breaking news headlines. Whether you’re interested in sports highlights, pop culture and entertainment or politics, Twitter is your source of information.

Live streaming events
Join the conversation or watch live videos to deeply engage with large audiences directly from your mobile device. Go Live, create your own live streaming events, share videos or sit back and watch events from around the world.

Privacy Policy: https://twitter.com/en/privacy
Terms and Conditions: https://twitter.com/en/tos

comments: Overall it is good. But there is a serious bug in this app. I have Twitter in couple of devices including Windows. When there is new messages, I open the windows app and see that message, and even after replying to that message, it shows the same new messages notification in my mobile too. Say that I didn't use my phone app for a week, but used the windows one. It would show the whole week's messages (no matter I read it or not) in my mobile. It is so frustrating

Very bad first impression! I just signed up and as I was composing my Direct Message to AirAsia Support, since there's lots of information to fill in, as I was finishing I was suddenly brought to another screen, asking me to proof that I'm not a robot (I was like huh what?) so I followed the instruction per the screen instructed, problem is when I've done all that Twitter brought me to my homepage and all the message I composed half way are GONE!!!!! PISSES ME OFF!!!!

It won't let me choose more than one photo for a post or a response. I keep hoping that this will get fixed in each update, but it continues to be an issue. Other functions are well, but sometimes it shows the link to a quoted tweet and not the tweet itself. Sometimes the link is a deleted tweet or the actual tweet. Not sure why that's happening. Otherwise I'm love using the app.

1 star for the new update where you have the feature to add an old tweet to the tweet you are about to type. It's absolutely ridiculous! One small mistake where you might swipe down accidentally , an older tweet gets added to the tweet you are typing and there's no way you can rid of it! Pls correct this fast or I'm gonna uninstall your app and never come back. This is seriously wasting my time.

They suspended my account with no explanation, email about it or when it will be resolved .. I have no idea what I did .. I don't even use it weekly .. I have written several emails and I get the the same computer generated generic email back! I will revise this review if and when they get in touch with me and resolve this issue

title: Instagram
description:
Bringing you closer to the people and things you love. — Instagram from Facebook

Connect with friends, share what you’re up to, or see what's new from others all over the world. Explore our community where you can feel free to be yourself and share everything from your daily moments to life's highlights.

Express Yourself and Connect With Friends

* Add photos and videos to your story that disappear after 24 hours, and bring them to life with fun creative tools.
* Message your friends in Direct. Start fun conversations about what you see on Feed and Stories.
* Post photos and videos to your feed that you want to show on your profile.

Learn More About Your Interests

* Check out IGTV for longer videos from your favorite creators.
* Get inspired by photos and videos from new accounts in Explore.
* Discover brands and small businesses, and shop products that are relevant to your personal style.

comments: I LOVE Instagram but since i got my new phone I can't use the thread camera for videos!! I've reported the problem many times and nothing happened!! I don't know whether it's a bug or a glitch i don't really understand this stuff but, whenever i record a video it only saves the first one it doesn't save the rest of the thread!!! It keeps telling me ERROR!

Not everytime but every few weeks, whenever I press the app, it will power my phone completely off. I have to restert my phone and delete the app, then reinstall it and log back into my account. Its not a massive problem but its still really annoying and inconvenient. Its happened more then 5 times. Also, when I want to send a picture, not all of them will show, it will appear grey and it doesn't load. All the pics work fine on every other platform except instagram

The app is good. The only concerns I have are 1) some of the app features aren't available in my country 2) the app sometimes crashes on anroid and 3) the new dark mode app is well but I think it would be much better if the text weren't so gray that makes it harder to read because of its nearness of shade with the background. I hope the developers or the response team reads this and addresses these concerns.

Instagram was great when I first installed it. I could look at the amazing pictures of my friends. Now I hate it. "Action Blocked" keeps occurring which prevents from following, unfollowing, and hearting my friend's pictures. This is ridiculous! I really wish Instagram will fix my problem. Then maybe I might write a 5 star review because it overall was a great app until this happened.

For some reason, some thumbnails are awfully blurry and there's nothing you can do about it. UPD: so sad that I can't remove the last star. After the recent update, stories started disappering out of the blue, sometimes my newsfeed gets totally empty. Also, I see no point in returning the horrendous old style emoji. Very poor job, Facebook.

title: Tumblr
description:
Tumblr is a place to express yourself, discover yourself, and bond over the stuff you love. Whether it’s fandoms or philosophy, fashion or felines, Tumblr is where your interests connect you with your people.

EXPRESS YOURSELF
— Post photos, GIFs, text, videos, live videos, audio, anything. 
— Make your own GIFs. Cover them in stickers and text, if you like.

BE YOURSELF
— Look however you want. Customize your Tumblr’s colors, fonts, layout, everything.
— Follow whatever topics you’re interested in. Find new ones you didn’t even know existed. 

CONNECT WITH YOUR PEOPLE
— Join millions of people in millions of communities across millions of #tags. 
— See something you love? Reblog it to your Tumblr and start a conversation.
— Start a private conversation with your friends in messaging. 
— Or just follow, if you’re feeling shy. No big deal.

Thanks for choosing Tumblr, a place to connect with others over shared interests.

There were some bugs with posts and posting. Now there are not. Carry on.

comments: The app forces me to use portrait mode, forces me to use infinite scroll, and to top it off it interupted my attempt to use it to ask me what I thought of the app. When asked to explain why I thought it was terrible it glitched out and didn't let me put in my reply then sent me all the way back up to the top of my dashboard. The app is completely worthless and I wouldn't have even tried if for some reason tumblr wasn't working correctly in my tablets browser.

On the Android version of the app, the button to create a post is a ball that vanishes whenever you scroll and reappears when you stop scrolling. However I've noticed that often I'll want to post and the button is nowhere to be found. I'd appreciate a way to toggle this feature on and off, where if it's on the button will appear as it is now, and if it's off it'll work like the IOS version: a solid button at the bottom of the screen that won't vanish.

This issue has been happening for YEARS and you still haven't fixed it! It's always saying I have no connection until I reopen the app a few times, and I can't even change my avatar! It says it changed it, but it's still the default avatar! I reopen the app, refresh the page, nothing happens! I used to love this app until the issues stopped getting fixed. Now I'm just thinking you guys are being lazy. We want a WORKING APP. Not one that constantly has delays in everything we do. I'm so done.

The app is great, but there is one problem with it that really annoys me and bothers me. When I click on a link in someone's description that is supposed to redirect you to one of their blogs, it redirects you to a internet browser format that says 'Open in App' & 'Get the App' instead of just staying in the app and taking you to that blog. It's super annoying!

I mean I still use it all the time. It has a genuinely unique platform that you really can't find anywhere else at all. The searching & blacklisting system has definitely always been one of my favourite parts. If the policies had been handled correctly it would have had a much higher rating. Instead they got greedy & got desperate instead. The lack of censor ship had caused it to be an amazing place for all kinds of artists, but instead of using it to their benefit they took it away.

(Note: After you register it may take up to 48 hours for you to receive the invite)

TUBBR, as we like to call it, The World's First Personal Social Network lets you create Private & Public social sharing spaces with Friends, Family & Fans.

Today's social media world is filled with a lot of irrelevant content and chaos. And, in search of meaningful and personalized engagement, we all are now moving towards smaller, more intimate and engaged micro-communities.

But, this changes with #TUBBR, the next-gen social media app.

- It's your personal social network
- Organize your stories
- Collaborate with friends
- Discover like-minded people
- Follow your interests
- Add Music to your Stories


Introducing TUBBR WALLS:
TUBBR gives you the ability to build and engage with communities via Segregated Spaces called Walls. Easily organize all aspects of your life, whether personal or professional by sharing stories on appropriate Walls.

- Create Private Walls with select people from your network.
TUBBR has also taken care of your Privacy & Security concerns as well. Private Walls let you have complete control of your content. Have conversations and share stories with the select members of this Wall only!

- Create Public Walls to Showcase your passion & for the world to discover.
These Walls can be about anything you like, be it your fashion trends to travel stories, food experiences to workout sessions, gaming to music videos. And, you can easily become a #TUBBRinfluencer on not just one but multiple passions you have!

Additionally, Each Private & Public Wall you create has its own Chat-Box as well. Fast & Secure messaging with 7-days auto-deletion, hence keeping your app inbox and mobile clean!

What makes TUBBR unique?

TUBBR is the only social media platform that lets you share stories with the right audience, hence bringing the 'Relevance' back into the social networks. All your stories are organized by Walls you create and not profiles! This architecture provides you with complete control over everything!

And unlike other apps, feeds are horizontally designed to restrict spamming, an AI that doesn't manipulate your newsfeed as it's always updated chronologically with no ads to ruin your browsing experience either!

--
We are always listening! If you run into any annoying bugs, have feature requests or just want to say Hi, email us at team@tubbr.co.

comments: I love, love, LOVE this application! I love how you can customize your posts to either public or private. Most importantly, I get to see the feeds I want...not the feeds the algorithm wants me to see. This is a much needed application! Did I mention the Team is always willing to help with questions and trouble shooting (if available) in a very timely manner? Oh! and not to forget to mention the community is warm and welcoming.

You'll love it. I found a whole community of like-minded people who have similar interests like me. Have no words to express my experience.. And such a different but needed concept (Personal Social Network). Overall very Smooth experience When I compared it with Facebook you can clearly see the difference ,fast uploads,7days Stories, Catagory of walls .. It is so much fun, Messaging Features still need some change Though

Its the worst app ever. It takes you to a website where it displays an access code for a second and then a video comes out of nowhere. And the worst part is, you don't get another code. Also, they don't even reply to your queries.

nevermind, I guess the review about this access code thing is correct. The app won't let you do anything without an access code, it takes you to their website to request a code. Ha! That website is a joke, I can't even get the United States, it tells me cannot be found. So, whatever. My opinion, move on to something else where they know what they're doing.

Its really good....its clean and its dope like the buttons are user friendly and i love it...it gives us access to lowkey good good musicians and singers too..so if you are interested in finding out genuine new artists..tubbr is one of the platform you need to visit. Peace to you all. Go tubbr...🔥🔥🔥🔥💥💥💥💥 booom

title: Taimi - LGBTQI+ Dating, Chat and Social Network
descriptionHTML:
Welcome on Taimi - LGBT Dating and Chat 🖤💣 Why Taimi? 👇👇👇


Taimi community is a first gay, lesbian, transgender, and bisexual dating app with more than 4,000,000 real users. Chat for free, call, make videos, create posts & stories, and find love.🖤

SO WHY TAIMI?
🚀 Just the best dating: swipe, match & chat with gay, lesbian, transgender, intersex, bisexual, asexual or other LGBT people;

🚀 Real users near you (and unique filter for relevant matches);

🚀 See who liked you;

🚀 Video and call messages:

🚀 Gamers, Pets lovers, Movies, Music, Memes - a little part of our communities;

🚀 See full statistic of your account;

All those features are free to use.

OUR STORY:
Taimi started as a unique Gay Dating, but now is more than a dating app for queer people - that's the community of open-minded and easy-going LGBT people who live their lives in all the colors of the rainbow. At the same time, you can swipe, match, chat, call and meet the partner of your dreams! You can enrich your network with like-minded queer people and meet someone special.

If you want to improve your app experience, you can purchase an optional subscription package TAIMI XL.

💣 Message and like as many people as you want before a match;

Our goal is to become the #1 LGBT Dating & Social Network in the world for lesbian, gay, transgender, bisexual communities since we understand that every man wants to meet his partner and every woman deserves to find her love too. Meet someone brutal with scruff or very tender and gentle, young or mature, calm or active - we bring together the greatest people.

Are you tired of the daily grind alone? Find out your soul mate, friend, or partner in Taimi.

comments: It's a good, friendly app with LOTS of features! I like that there's a newsfeed, video posting, groups you can join, add friends, etc. There are certain features (for unlimited use) you have to pay for which is understandable. I don't like that it notifies everytime someone views your profile. Why do I need to know who viewed my profile and decided not to "like" me? And why would I want every person instantly knowing I'm viewing their profile (especially when they're "online")... Awkward.

It's such a shame, I was enjoying this app alot for the first 2/3 days. My account was flagged and banned for NO reason. I had no reason to have breached any of the terms. The online support was arrogant and and explained nothing. The links the 'support' send do not work. I was enjoying my time with the people I met on here, but that has all be wasted because of poor support from Taimi.

It's okay but has been frustrating. I get that you have to pay for certain features or at least do a free trial. Which I get you can cancel at anytime but I really don't want to have to add my card. Tell me why everytime I post a full body picture (that's appropriate, just doesn't show my face head on) isn't accepted when others I swipe thru are able to - I've been talked with CS already, not the best answers. Anytime I send a verification pic, not accepted either no matter how I take it.

This app has been making me feel like a star. I've been enjoying the "Boost" feature so much I've already purchased like 10 since I created my account a week ago. It's just so fun it becomes addicting. You activate it, and seconds later likes and messages just flood your inbox. Call me an attention seeker, but I mean, who doesn't love that.

I've suprinsingly been enjoying this app quite a lot. I've just been wondering how come nobody thought of this before. It feels like we've always needed an app for LGBTQI+ people, but never knew it. Well, either way, now we do and that's great! Taimi is a young app but you can tell it has potential. I definitely recommend it to everyone :)

title: Social One - Facebook, Instagram & Twitter
description:
With Social One, you can use Facebook, Instagram and Twitter without sacrificing your battery or mobile storage. Social One is a light-weight app that allows you to access all 3 social networks in their mobile-friendly web interfaces and with the look & feel of the original apps.

Enjoy rich features, such as:
Swiping between Facebook, Instagram and Twitter
Fast download, almost no memory consumption
Modern and simple design

Social One is free to use forever. No additional ads or in-app purchases.

Privacy Policy and Service Terms:
We care a lot about your privacy and we work hard to safeguard the data we collect and to comply will all relevant laws and regulations.

To keep Social One 100% free, we only collect anonymous, non-personal user demographics and ad data for market research purposes, namely, to build special advertising related insights and analyses for brands that work with us. We do not collect, store, use, share or sell any of your personal information.

Please review our service terms and privacy policy below, before you install the extension, to learn more about what data we collect about you and what we use it for. If you have any questions concerning your privacy, please contact us at: privacy@unimania.xyz. 

Privacy policy: http://privacy.unimania.xyz/privacy_policy_social_one.html
Service terms: http://privacy.unimania.xyz/service_terms_eula_social_one.html

Contact us:
We are here for you. If you find a bug or have a new feature in mind, or if you have a question about the extension or your privacy, please don’t hesitate to contact us at: social.one@unimania.xyz

Copyright notice:
Social One was developed by Unimania Inc. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by Facebook Inc., Instagram Inc. or Twitter Inc. Facebook™, Instagram™ and Twitter™ are trademarks of Facebook Inc., Instagram Inc. or Twitter Inc. respectively.

comments: Is it possible to use multiple accounts for Instagram? I'm able to do this with the normal Instagram app, and it would be nice to be able to do it with yours too. Also, it would be good if while viewing Instagram, swiping left or right would go between pictures when there is a multi-picture posting. Currently swiping left will flip you over to Twitter. why not just leave the swapping between Facebook, Twitter, Instagram to be the icons on the bottom of the screen.

Good experience, but some cons. 1) The dark background should be Jet black, instead of the dull grey! Also, why not other colors? 2) I would like a split-screen, to post on facebook and twitter, at once, when I chose to do so! 'Double-share!' 5 stars when I can!
Runs fast, and quick to upload. Also, Messenger is included. You don't have to download Messenger separately. You aren't blocked in by ads, either. It's great. It's got everything I need.

I've contacted the developers about the bugs I experienced, specifically related to Instagram and Twitter malfunctions. Instagram is painfully slow, and not really functional. Twitter has the problem where the platform selection menu obscures the text box when you are typing a message. If these can be fixed, the app would be a 5-star app.

I like how you can just flip from Facebook to twitter to instagram and I also like that Messenger it on here as well. I just have two suggest for you one is if you could make this into a lite version that would be great also if you could add tic tok to it that all would be great but so far I like it and for now I given it a five star but was I suggest for this would make it a wonderful app thanks you.

comments: This app truly sucks. Keeps freezing, was to have verification of phone number or password every couple of days. Once you get verification code and enter it says phone number is invalid, yet it is the same number that the text was sent to. To me it is a very terrible date site. Even after uninstall and reinstall. Does not work. Says phone number is invalid. Truly sucks UPDATE, INSTALLED OK WAS A LE TO LONG IN . HAD TO UNINSTALL AND THEN REINSTALL . THIS IS WHAT HAPPENED REINSTALLED AND SAYS I HAVE TO I NEED TO VERIFY. FOR GOOGLE . Google sent number to verify. I go back to open and says I need to install the app. Page comes up that I need to install. Click on it and will not let me install as I already have it installed on my phone. . Could you please fix.

I like the app but, on occasion when I am in a friends live stream I can't see my own comments or anyone elses. Also, I have an account that I had many years ago that I can't log into due to the fact it asks me to verify a phone # I no longer have what should I do about the lssue of not being able to login to my old account ?

Not a good app at all... All you get is Bots Galore... Not to mention everytime you post a picture for your profile or anything else it turns out to be blurry then what it looks like after you've taken the picture... and that problem needs to be fixed because I'm not liking the way my pictures are turning out when I post them...

At first I enjoyed this app, but soon after it kept signing me out and then told me it couldnt load my messages. After getting no help from the support center (who basically only told me to uninstall it and install it again, and then to change my password), I made a new profile to see if that would work. It did! For an hour. Now Im back again to no messages and it boots me out. I basically cant use the app. It would be great if they could get whatever issue this is resolved.

0 rating because of the problems it has started creating...at first it worked well later it showed that my account is compromised and i need to change password..it did that but even after doing so now when i try to sign in the message pops up that my account is flagged and i need to verify my account..i click the verify link but the window that opens up asks me to download the latest version...i uninstalled the previous version and downloaded again from play store but the position is same.

title: Social Media Vault
description:
★All-in-one solution for all your social media needs.
★ Access multiple social media accounts via just ONE APP
★ No need for other apps anymore!
★100% secure Social Media Platform!

"Social Media Vault" allows you to access multiple social media accounts via just one app. With its password-protected interface, you don’t have to worry about others hacking into your account. Using this app’s social media dashboard, you can fearlessly access Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and other social apps. In addition, the application has a host of secondary security features that keeps your social network accounts hidden from others. Social Media Vault saves you from downloading separate social media apps. It lets you access all your accounts within a secure interface, making it a perfect and unique social media manager application!

Fingerprint Lock

In this application, you’re well able to protect and access your confidential data using your unique fingerprint. A fingerprint locking option is now made available which is mostly found rare in other apps.

Different Security locks

Set up a Password, PIN or Pattern as your primary security credentials. It is your perfect social media lock and is the only app that offers such reliable security.

Anti- Hack

If someone tries to access your social networking apps behind you back, you can easily track down that crook via the anti-hack feature. The app captures the image of the culprit with the front camera of your smartphone along with the time stamp and you can check all the information about the hack attempt whenever you want.

Panic Switch

No need to worry if someone tries to snoop into your phone or suddenly arrives when you are surfing your social sites. The Panic Switch is here to save you. This feature allows you to switch to another app quickly by just shaking, flicking or placing the palm of your hand on the screen of your phone. It allows you to hide the contents of your app from any person passing by.

Hide App icon

This feature dynamically hides the app’s icon, preventing snoopers from discovering or finding the app on your smartphone. Means, you can enjoy using any social media account and no one will ever know.

Private Browser

You can Socialize freely with the app’s built-in Private Browser and leave no traces of browsing behind. Plus, you can surf the web without the fear of getting your browsing history tracked. Internet browsing was never this safe.

For more information visit http://www.newsoftwares.net/

title: Badoo — Dating App to Chat, Date & Meet New People
description:
Welcome to Badoo, the place to date honestly 💜

In a society that profits on our self-doubt, Badoo is the place where it pays to be the real, unapologetic you. We fight the ambiguity of modern dating with authentic, unfiltered conversation. We believe real connection is born from being honest in who you are and what you really want. 

Download Badoo and start your dating journey! Join the biggest online dating app in the world, with more than 460 million users who trust us.

Be honest
The key is to be yourself. Be clear in what you're looking for and who you'd like to find on Badoo. Badoo is a social network that allows you to match and find a partner, or chat with people and find friends close to you. We’re so much more than just online dating apps.

You're in good hands 🤞
Badoo is a platform that consistently ensures safety and respect within our community. We do not tolerate any kind of inappropriate behavior and have strict usage guidelines, as well as an extensive list of safety features to ensure that you have the best dating experience with us. 

How Badoo works 
We make it easier to meet people near in the way you want to meet them...

✔ People Nearby: Meet honest singles around you

✔ Encounters: Straight forward swiping, right for 😍 and left for 🙅‍♀️🙅‍♂️. Start flirting today!

✔ Video Chat: Connect with your matches through face to face video calling

✔ Verified profiles: We have a thorough three-step verification process which, once completed, you can choose to only interact with other verified profiles and find friends

Become Premium
Serious about dating honestly? Then activate Badoo Premium. You'll be able to access plenty of new, exciting features that will help you get the most out of our app:

⭐️ Find out who added you to their favorites and meet singles.

⭐️ See who liked your profile. It's time to meet new people and find friends!

⭐️ Get your messages read first.

⭐️ Swiped left on the person of your dreams? You can go back with premium! 

⭐️ And much more...

The price of a Badoo Premium subscription starts at £2.29/week. The price varies by country and may change without notice, but you can always see the exact price in the app. We will charge your card and your subscription will be automatically renewed unless you deactivate the automatic recharge a minimum of 24 hours before the end of your current subscription period. Badoo Premium is flexible and adapts to your needs - you can cancel your subscription at any time.  
     
From Online to Offline 
13,000 people delete Badoo every day because they found someone on Badoo, which is pretty amazing. So whether you’re looking for someone to be with for a reason, a season or a lifetime, we’re sure you’re about to find what you’re looking for. 

For more information, read our Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://www.badoo.com/privacy
https://badoo.com/terms

comments: This was an ok app at first and so I decided to check out the premium feature just to see what it's about. You pay around $8 dollars a week to have premium. What does premium get you? Almost nothing! With premium you get to see who added you as a favorite, see who liked you, get priority message, chat with new profiles, undo no votes, and go incognito mode. That's all you get for $7 a week and that's $28 a month. Even with premium, you still have to use credits and credits do not come with premium. I was thinking for $7/week, you should get a lot more or even credit every time you renew but nope. Do not get premium because it's not work the cost.

They use fake profiles to contact you and make you believe people want to talk to you, which is in and on itself a disgusting business practice. Furthermore, for the real accounts, you have to pay to send messages. Yes, you can like profiles and if they like you back you can text, but girls get so many messages, they don't like profiles at all, so that's a wasted effort. Then there are the unskippable ads, just kill me now. Find another dating app, they're all owned by the same company anyway.

Suddenly ads. Ads everywhere. Completetly ruins it all. Also most users are inactive. Constant nagging about paying. And (very) large amount of out of country persons... Yes. It is free to use. But three ads on the screen at the same time is kinda screwed up. Usability and experience went down the drain compared to the competitors. Solved it by deleting my account and uninstalling 😎

purchased credits for $3:00. Lastnight, then I go shopping today and my account has no money!! I check my account and you have took an extra $30 dollars in a second payment that I didn't buy!!!! Soon as I brought the $3:00 payment the app went weird and wouldn't load properly, Very unhappy and I want my $30 dollars back!!!! Get back to me soon as possible as I need petrol They just stole more money DELETE THIS APP TWICE THEY HAVE STOLE FROM ME I GAVE THEM PROOF, AND THEY DONT WANT TO KNOWBOUTIT

This was once the best free app period for getting matches but that's unfortunately no longer the case. You were able to watch ads to generate premium currency to purchase boosts, which I felt was a fair trade off, but they removed this feature a couple of months ago. I have gone from getting 5-10 likes a day to 1 a week. In fact I forgot I even had this installed on my phone until I saw it try to update. Until they change it back to the way it used to be I won't be using it anymore.

title: Mexico Social- Dating App & Date Chat for Mexicans
description:
Are you attracted to Mexican people or are you looking to meet people in Mexico? We have a great new app for you.

Mexico Social is the best free dating app to connect with Mexican singles or to meet Mexican singles from around the world. Mexico Social is a great way to meet people around you in Mexico, make new friends and mingle with them, or to find lasting relationships and even for marriage! It’s all here. Whether you are looking to see Mexican girls and their ‘Ballet Folklorico dance’ or you’re looking for a friend during your stay in Mexico, Mexico Social will have someone for you!

Our mission is to help you find the type of relationship you are looking for.

What makes Mexico Social unique is this: You can meet people directly by watching videos of them. Meeting new people, making friends, chatting, socializing, and even dating has never been that fun!

Unlike other networks… we have video profiles! They say a picture is worth a thousand words and a video is at least a thousand pictures! We created a video based social app, because you can express yourself more accurately with videos and let your personality shine through! Too shy to upload a video? We have photos too but the videos are much more exciting! 

Don't feel like looking at photos or videos of people and singles? Then hangout in our chat rooms and message people nearby or everywhere else right away. Chat with local people or join the world chat room and chat with people from all over the world. We are also introducing our newest feature Flash Chat. With flash chat, you send pictures, videos, or even audio clips that will delete itself forever after you set the timer. It’s a really fun and cool feature. 

Love to meet new people, make friends or find a date to hangout with tonight? It's easy! You can start by seeing video clips of singles and when you like someone, just click the heart. If they like you back, we will connect both of you. Want to help break the ice? Send them a ‘Hi’! You can send unlimited messages, videos and photos to each other. Finding a date, meeting new friends, chatting, dating has never been so easy. And best of all, it's FREE! 

Our Features?
- group social chat rooms
- private inbox with photo, video and audio
- make fans (people that like you)
- or friends (people you like back)
- video and photo profiles
- tags system in profiles
- FREE way to meet new friends

Why use Mexico Social?
- meet new people
- make new friends locally or globally
- generate fans 
- see funny and interesting videos of people
- local chat room, world chat room, and many others

title: inLinx Social Network - new app
description:
inLinx Social Network is the latest innovation in Social Media Networking.

Are you looking for a way to connect with your friends but hide your secrets from grandma? Then, you’ve come to the right place. With a booming number of users, inLinx is the newest innovation in social media networking that allows you to connect and network on your own terms.

Create virtual families in the app just like your relationships in real life. Then, you can use our exclusive “treat as” function to determine what each of your “Linx” can see and do. So, if grandma’s snooping around in your business, reduce what she can see without her every finding out. Whether you decide to treat your friends like family, or your family like strangers is completely up to you.

Unlike typical social media giants, inLinx also ensures that none of your personal social media activities can be found on Google or any other search engines. Therefore, you’re 100% free and secure to truly be who you are. 

inLinx isn’t just one app – It’s all the apps you’ll ever need. Although primarily a social networking app, inLinx also has a digital marketplace where you can promote your business for free through our SEO-friendly business listing. Through this marketplace, your company, idea, service, or product can reach the top of Google pages and essentially save you thousands on ads. Now, businesses and entrepreneurs can register their product or service, reach new customers, and increase sales! 


And it doesn’t stop there! inLinx can also act as a news app, providing everything you need to know about the world around you. Instead of following a specific brand or company, you’ll follow a thread that interests you. So, if you like film and TV shows, get all the latest and greatest updates straight to your mobile device. 

So, what are you waiting for?

Virtualise your family. Make Linx to the World. Make New Friends. Make Money.

Your virtual life begins here.

title: Sprout Social - Social Media
description:
The perfect companion app for Sprout Social so you can manage your social media anywhere. You must have a Sprout Social account to use this app. 

All of your favorite Sprout Social features are now available on the go!

Engage with your audience, manage team workflow and monitor your brand while on the go. Whether you are behind the counter helping customers or on the tarmac headed to a conference in Vegas, you will have the power to keep your business social.

The Android app will put the power of Sprout Social in the palm of your hand, allowing you to:
• Manage all of your social feeds from one intuitive application
• Complete Social and Brand monitoring from anywhere
• Send updates to all of your social networks on the go
• Genius strikes at all hours - schedule, draft or queue messages to send at a later time
• View reach, clicks and retweets of sent messages
• Assign personal or team tasks for follow-up

Sprout Social is a social media management tool created to help businesses manage their social media efforts more effectively and efficiently.

Sprout Social integrates with multiple social networks where consumers are engaging with businesses and brands. When used with your Sprout Social account, it offers team or individual engagement and publishing tools with in-depth analytics, brand monitoring, competitive insights and social CRM features. Sprout Social is known for its intuitive, easy to use web and mobile platform.

title: Tribe Social
description:
Tribe Social allows you to stay connected with friends and co-workers without the rest of the world getting in your way.

Each tribe is your very own secure, invitation-only, private activity stream, where you can share files and have discussions in the same great ways that you’ve become accustomed to on public social networks. Without all the friend requests, birthday reminders, and event invites to get in your way.

Tribes are a great place for close friends to keep in touch, co-workers to collaborate on projects, or professionals to learn. Any communication that deserves privacy deserves a tribe.

With robust analytics built in, you can keep track of what your tribe is talking about and turn those insights into action. See which members of your tribe are the most active, what the popular topics are, and when your tribe members are the most engaged. Conversations are great, but being able to learn from them is better.

title: Thai Social - App for Thais to Chat, Match, & Date
description:
Are you attracted to Thai people or are you looking to meet people in Thailand? We have a great new app for you.

Thai Social is the best free dating app to connect with Thai singles or to meet Thai singles from around the world. Thai Social is a great way to meet people around you in Thailand, make new friends and mingle with them, or to find lasting relationships and even for marriage! It’s all here. Whether you are looking to see Thai girls or you’re looking for a friend during your stay in Thailand, Thai Social will have someone for you!


Our mission is to help you find the type of relationship you are looking for.

What makes Thai Social unique is this: You can meet people directly by watching videos of them. Meeting new people, making friends, chatting, socializing, and even dating has never been that fun!

Unlike other networks… we have video profiles! They say a picture is worth a thousand words and a video is at least a thousand pictures! We created a video based social app, because you can express yourself more accurately with videos and let your personality shine through! Too shy to upload a video? We have photos too but the videos are much more exciting! 

Don't feel like looking at photos or videos of people and singles? Then hangout in our chat rooms and message people nearby or everywhere else right away. Chat with local people or join the world chat room and chat with people from all over the world. We are also introducing our newest feature Flash Chat. With flash chat, you send pictures, videos, or even audio clips that will delete itself forever after you set the timer. It’s a really fun and cool feature. 

Love to meet new people, make friends or find a date to hangout with tonight? It's easy! You can start by seeing video clips of singles and when you like someone, just click the heart. If they like you back, we will connect both of you. Want to help break the ice? Send them a ‘Hi’! You can send unlimited messages, videos and photos to each other. Finding a date, meeting new friends, chatting, dating has never been so easy. And best of all, it's FREE! 

Our Features?
- group social chat rooms
- private inbox with photo, video and audio
- make fans (people that like you)
- or friends (people you like back)
- video and photo profiles
- tags system in profiles
- FREE way to meet new friends

Why use Thai Social?
- meet new people
- make new friends locally or globally
- generate fans 
- see funny and interesting videos of people
- local chat room, world chat room, and many others

title: DogCha! Dog Owners Social Community
description:
Make your dog walk a more social experience with DogCha! the incredible social app for dog owners that like to easily and quickly discover locations for every need of their dog. Add friends, mark locations and collect doggies to get rewards!
 
🐕MAKE YOUR DOG WALK A SOCIAL EXPERIENCE
For owners of dogs, this social app offers all the features a dog owner needs to make the dog walk a more social experience. Easy to use, user-friendly and quite unique, this dog app offers you the ability to easily and quickly discover locations, to add friends, chat and see if they are at the park, check dogs of other owners and much more, directly on your phone. Anytime and anywhere you and your dog are, on this social network you will find everything needed at your reach.
 
📍FIND HIGHLIGHTS AND MARK LOCATIONS
The dog walking app offers you highlights such as parks, bins, fountains, vets and any other dog needs that are closest to you. All the locations you find on this amazing social app are marked by the users. Also, to help other dog owners you can also mark locations to help others users discover dog places without much effort, just with a tap on this practical and helpful social network for dog owners. Get doggies for marking locations!
 
💰COLLECT DOGGIES AND CASH THEM FOR REWARDS
By marking locations on this app you are rewarded with doggies. Collect as many doggies as possible and when you have enough, cash in the doggies for rewards. Simple and yet quite efficient, this dog network offers you a dog community for you to connect with other dog owners and dogs. The social app saves you a lot of time by helping you discover the closest dog locations for every need of your dog.
 
 
🗨️DOGCHA! FEATURES
✅ Easy to use and user-friendly
✅Make your dog walk a more social experience
✅ Add friends
✅ Check out other people’s dogs
✅ Loot at highlights for your dog’s needs
✅ Locations are marked by users
✅ Mark a location and get rewarded with doggies
✅ Cash in your doggies for rewards
✅ Free for download

Turn your dog walks into a fun experience, discover locations, connect with other owners and get rewards.
Download it now on Google Play for FREE!

comments: Under Android 10 when I want to send a picture, all of the pictures in my list Flickr and flash and I can't tell one picture from the other and which I want to send. Or if I open the app suddenly it goes crazy and tells me I have a ton of messages that I missed because it never sends notifications. This app is very frustrating!!!!!
Though im still not pleased by it, im glad im not the only one to be having issues with my picture gallery. Issue started approximately a month ago. Please fix this.

title: Japan Social- Asian Dating Chat App. Meet Japanese
description:
Love the Japanese culture? Want to meet local Japanese people or people in Japan? Then we are excited to present to you the perfect app for connecting with the Japanese community… Japan Social!

Japan Social is the best social network that helps you connect with Japanese people from all over the world. Whether you are looking to make new Japanese friends, meet Japanese singles, or find a lasting relationship using our dating features, Japan Social will have someone for you to connect with. 

Our mission is to help you find the type of relationship you are looking for.

We expanded our vision from dating to helping people connect for whatever type of connection they are looking for. You can still find that special someone using the dating side of the app, but we opened our app to do much more!

What makes Japan Social unique is this: You can meet people directly by watching videos of them. Meeting new people, making friends, chatting, socializing, and even dating single people has never been that fun!

Unlike other networks… we have video profiles! They say a picture is worth a thousand words and a video is at least a thousand pictures! We created a video based social app, because you can express yourself more accurately with videos and let your personality shine through! Too shy to upload a video? We have photos too but the videos are much more exciting! 

Don't feel like looking at photos or videos of people and singles? Then hangout in our chat rooms and message people nearby or everywhere else right away. Chat with local people or join the world chat room and chat with people from all over the world. 

Love to meet new people, make friends or find a date to hangout with tonight? It's easy! You can start by seeing video clips of singles and when you like someone, just click the heart. If they like you back, we will connect both of you. Want to help break the ice? Send them a ‘Hi’! You can send unlimited messages, videos and photos to each other. Finding a date, meeting new friends, chatting, dating has never been so easy. And best of all, it's FREE! 

Our Features?
- group social chat rooms
- private inbox with photo, video and audio
- make fans (people that like you)
- or friends (people you like back)
- video and photo profiles
- tags system in profiles
- FREE way to meet new friends

Why use Japan Social?
- meet new people

- generate fans 
- see funny and interesting videos of people
- local chat room, world chat room, and many others

title: MeWe
description:
MeWe is the uplifting next-gen social network with awesome social features and No BS. No Ads, No Targeting, No Newsfeed manipulation. 

MeWe has exciting, easy-to-use features for authentic connecting with friends, family, and common interest groups, including: dedicated newsfeeds for close friends versus all contacts; private and open groups; fan and business pages; great chat features for both 1:1 and group chats; disappearing content; fun custom camera with cool tricks and GIF creation; live voice and live video for around the world connections; next-gen voice messaging; personal social cloud; custom member profiles for every group; and more.

MeWe members enjoy total control over what they share along with full ownership of their content and data. The next-gen social networking platform has no facial recognition, and no newsfeed or content manipulation common on other social media platforms. MeWe members see every post, chat, comment, etc., made by individuals, pages and groups they are connected with, in true timeline order.

MeWe members own their data and enjoy the protection of MeWe’s Privacy Bill Of Rights. MeWe is advised by Sir Tim Berners-Lee, the inventor of the Web, and MeWe's CEO, Mark Weinstein, is a world renowned privacy advocate. 

MeWe is the social network for everyone who wants to have fun, communicate authentically and share like-minded & disparate ideas under the umbrella of trust, control, and safety. Let's MeWe!"

Premium EmojiOne.com sticker packs are available in the MeWe Store. Copyright JoyPixels Inc. 2019.

I couldn't access my messages, can't refresh, My feed isn't loading new post in. I uninstalled to see if it would help but now I can't even sign back in! It keeps saying "We're sorry. Something went wrong." My wifi is perfectly fine so it is not the internet.

So I don't know what happened but my account just suddenly disappeared and i'm quite upset about this because I assumed this app wasn't no BS app to mess with your account. I agreed to the terms and i'm very active so I don't understand why it just disappeared or reset. Yet again it has messed up and now I am not able to access it at all!

For two days I have not been able to access my messages or notifications. I can see taht I have both, but when I try to access either of them, I just get a blank white screen with the spinning loading circle... for two days!!!!! I have loved this app, but if this doesn't fix there won't be much use in keeping it.

Great alternative to FB!!! I wish more of my friends/family would migrate! No ads, ability to post humor without ridiculous bans. Tons of memes and so many group chats! 4 stars because they could improve the feed. Hou have to re-scroll your feed and group posts to see all posts, it doesn't disappear from feed after view, emoji, comment or share. They're open to feedback, don't manipulate users with algorithms, spy on users, sell info or bombard you with ads. Overall LOVE!

title: China Social- Chinese Dating Video App & Chat Room
description:
China Social is premium online dating application in China. China Social is designed to bring Chinese Single Men and Women in our community together, where you can make friends and meet Chinese singles. Find an activity partner, new friends, a cool date or a soulmate, for a casual or long term relationship. Join our growing online community, where you can exchange videos, chat and  photos with beautiful single men and women in china. China Social is user friendly app can help you the perfect mate near you.

Our mission is to help you find the type of relationship you are looking for.

What makes China Social unique is this: You can meet people directly by watching videos of them. Meeting new people, making friends, chatting, socializing, and even dating has never been that fun!

Unlike other networks… we have video profiles! They say a picture is worth a thousand words and a video is at least a thousand pictures! We created a video based social app, because you can express yourself more accurately with videos and let your personality shine through! Too shy to upload a video? We have photos too but the videos are much more exciting! 

Don't feel like looking at photos or videos of people and singles? Then hangout in our chat rooms and message people nearby or everywhere else right away. Chat with local people or join the world chat room and chat with people from all over the world. 

Love to meet new people, make friends or find a date to hangout with tonight? It's easy! You can start by seeing video clips of singles and when you like someone, just click the heart. If they like you back, we will connect both of you. Want to help break the ice? Send them a ‘Hi’! You can send unlimited messages, videos and photos to each other. Finding a date, meeting new friends, chatting, dating has never been so easy. And best of all, it's FREE!

- private inbox with photo, video and audio

- FREE way to meet new friends

- generate fans 
- see funny and interesting videos of people
- local chat room, world chat room, and many others
