title: All Social Media: All Social Networks in one app
description:
Are you tired of using social networking apps separately? Do you want to have access to all your social network apps in one place? Then no need worry because our all-in-one social network app will help you.

All-in-One Social Network app provides an easy access to all major social networks .

All social media app is one of the most popular and useful social media management services and it is a browser with the most popular sites like Google and Messenger, explores beautiful pictures and shares them with Pinterest. You can watch hollywood movies and bollywood movies on some great sites like Netflix. It also contains the Wattpad website for international novels and stories. In Medi for all social media and social networks in one application.

All social media and social networks is a free private browser for social media and social networks chats. This all-in-one social media app displays a lot of social media such as instant messaging that allows you to chat, video calls & send instant messages on social networks. It also provides you with a lot of great marketing sites like Alibaba and Amazon and makes you spend happy times on entertainment sites like YouTube and TikTok and enjoy music and SMS with your loved ones. International sports websites and international news, as well as ads, real estate, and some educational sites and fun games on your smartphone.


It also provides you with a lot of great shopping sites like Alibaba and Amazon and makes you spend happy times in entertainment sites like YouTube and tiktok and enjoy music and SMS with your loved ones. This all-in-one social media app is a secure private browser for social media and social networks that displays all social media such as messages which will allow you to chat, video calls and send instant messages on social networks. By using this all-in-one social media app you can save lot of space and speed up your device by using all of the following social networks just in one our apps:
-- Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, Youtube, Google+, Linkedin, Tagged


You can manage just about any social network you can think of.
You can update, manage, and track all your social network profiles and pages in the easy-to-use dashboard



This app contains all the famous social networks sites and shopping sites.
It allows Smartphone users to access their multiple social network accounts from single mobile app.
Our Social Messenger app will let you can access all the messenger and social apps without installing them & without extra mobile data consumption.
This application features almost all social networking sites and social networks in one application
Its very easy to use: Browse all social media, marketing, social network, Messengers, advertising, sms, IM on your phone in one application.
Browse more than 75 social media, social network, marketing, Messengers, advertising, sms, IM.
You can save up to 85% Of memory on your smartphone. 
You can lock the program with a secret number. We give you the full security privilege of the application with a security code to prevent intruders and hackers from accessing the app and private accounts for each of the social networking sites.
You do not need to install as many social media, social network, marketing, Messengers, advertising, sms, IM. Also you can save about 250 MB on your mobile phone, according to the software and applications loaded on your phone.

You can easily access all of the major social networks within this app.


NOTE: 
- If you can not find your favorite social network, please contact us. We will try to add it in future updates.
- We are not affiliated with any of the services accessible through this application.

title: Crowdfire: Social Media Manager
description:
Crowdfire is a powerful social media tool used by businesses and individuals all over the world to drive social media engagement and growth.

Crowdfire works with Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, Twitter, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Wordpress, Etsy, Shopify, Medium, 500px, Vimeo and many more platforms.

What can Crowdfire do for you?

- Support your customers with our Mention feature. 

- Compose your own posts and schedule them to go out later.

- Automatically find and recommend articles and images your audience will love, so you can share them to all your social profile and keep your timelines buzzing!

- Keep an eye out for any updates on your website, blog or online shops; and create quick, beautiful posts about the update to easily share on all your social profiles

- Schedule all your posts in advance and post them automatically at the best times or at a time chosen by you. Saving you tons of time and effort!

- Take away the headache of crafting separate posts for each individual social profile and automagically customize your posts for all your profiles!

- Use the Chrome extension to share your favourite pages from the internet to all your social accounts in 2 easy clicks!

- Add your favourite websites and blogs as your source for new content using the RSS feature!

Crowdfire is a favourite amongst Social Media Managers all over the world! 

Please send any questions & feedback to hello@crowdfireapp.com - our community team is always here for you!

Pricing
You can use Crowdfire for free but there are a few limits for free users.
You can purchase our subscription starter plan Plus to remove few limits. This plan is an auto-renewing 1-month or 12-month plan.
Plus
- 2 linked accounts
- Upto 100 scheduled posts per social account
- Publish to Pinterest
- Add your RSS feeds - up to 5.
$9.99/month & $89.88/12-months

Our prices are in USD and may vary depending on prevailing exchange rates. You may cancel your subscription at any point. If you cancel during the active subscription period, no refund will be given.
Payment will be charged to your Google Play account. You will be charged for auto-renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renewal through the settings in your Google Play account.
Read our terms of use: https://www.crowdfireapp.com/tos
Read our privacy policy: https://www.crowdfireapp.com/privacy

recentChanges: Now, every time you type @ and have a specific Social Network selected, you’ll get suggestions to tag the right usernames. Yes, username suggestion is here so that you can tag all the right accounts.
comments: All in all decently designed app. Due to certain restrictions in the app and other platforms it kind of all boils down to its Twitter integration, which currently doesn't work. To a degree this app is in limbo until it's integration issues are resolved, but I must be fair this app has potential

Meh, if you have a basic plan and you can get it to work after trying to authenticate with Facebook (I only managed once), you'll be luck enough to see some fairly mediocre analysis. Much less info than Instagram itself. The scheduling works fine and lets you edit ahead of time, so that's quite good - just not as user friendly as their website. I'd stick to the crowdfire website and leave this app alone - the website is far more useful. The app feels like a bit of an afterthought.

This is like a combo of Buffer & Feedly. I get suggested articles based on the topics I choose & can post them to up to 3 platforms. I can add my blog, website, etsy to schedule posts from them too. I wish the free plan included Pinterest & allowed more than 7 scheduled at a time. I also wish they worked with Teespring. The paid features (RSS, advanced analytics, & a video of my success to share) are tempting. I can't afford that at this time, though 😓
Free version is already limited, then they try to milk you once you've scheduled 100 posts. There's no point in the free version. Uninstalling and finding something else.
Outstanding way to improve your social media footprint! I can't recommend it enough. Easy to set up and easier to use. Great job!

title: Tinder
description:
With 30 billion matches to date, Tinder® is the world’s most popular app for meeting new people. Think of us as your most dependable wingmate—wherever you go, we’ll be there. If you’re here to meet new people, expand your social network, meet locals when you’re traveling, or just live in the now, you’ve come to the right place. We’re called “the world’s hottest app” for a reason: we spark more than 26 million matches per day. How many dating apps can match that?

Find friends, dates to everything in between. From casual dates to serious relationships - Tinder has it all!

Match. Chat. Date. Tinder is easy and fun—use the Swipe Right™ feature to Like someone, use the Swipe Left™ feature to pass. If someone likes you back, It’s a Match! We invented the double opt-in so that two people will only get matched when there’s a mutual interest. No stress. No rejection. Just tap through the profiles you’re interested in, chat online with your matches, then step away from your phone, meet up in the real world and spark something new.

Find singles near me - Set up your location settings and find local singles in your area. Whether you’re looking to meet new people in Boston, go dating in Miami or find love in New York - Tinder is the app for you!

Now, let’s get started. And remember, when in doubt, give a Swipe Right™. Trust us, the more options you have, the better-looking life becomes. 

Tinder is more than a dating app—the largest, hottest community of singles in the world. Don’t be shy, come on over.

MORE FEATURES? THAT’S A PLUS

Upgrade to Tinder Plus® for premium features, including: Unlimited Likes so you can use the Swipe Right feature to match with more people. Passport to match & chat with singles anywhere around the world, Rewind to give someone a second chance, one free Boost per month to be the top profile in your area for 30 minutes, and additional Super Likes to stand out from the crowd & get matched.

GET THE GOLD TREATMENT

Upgrade to Tinder Gold™ for a first-class dating app experience: Passport, Rewind, Unlimited Likes, five Super Likes per day, one Boost per month, and more profile controls. But wait, it gets better. Save time and aimless searching with our Likes You feature, which lets you see who likes you. Think of it as your personal Tinder concierge—available 24/7—bringing all of your pending matches to you. Now you can sit back, enjoy a fine cocktail, and browse through profiles at your leisure. Goodbye search fatigue. Hello #GoldLife

-----------------------------------

If you choose to purchase Tinder Plus or Tinder Gold, payment will be charged to your Google Play account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the Play Store after purchase. Current Tinder Plus subscription price starts at $9.99 USD/month, and one-month, 6-month and 12-month packages are available. Current Tinder Gold subscription price starts at $14.99 USD/month, and one-month, 6-month and 12-month packages are available. Prices are in U.S. dollars, may vary in countries other than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase Tinder Plus or Tinder Gold, you can simply continue using Tinder for free.

All photos are of models and used for illustrative purposes only.

Privacy: https://www.gotinder.com/privacy
Terms: https://www.gotinder.com/terms

recentChanges: Bug fixes and improvements
comments: It's free and it works. You can pay if you want to see the women or men that liked your profile but most likely you'll come across them in mutual match and that's free. People actually respond for the most part too. They like you why not message you back. I always message first cause it's just easier than waiting. I'd give it 5 stars if they had a free month trial or even a week, but it doesn't sadly. Overall it works as intended and you'll meet people if you put yourself out there.

Got an email from customer care regarding my problem telling me to log out and back in to sort out the problems with the app but when I emailed them back to say that doesn't work, I was just ignored. A month now and I'm still waiting for a solution. (One of the Problems is it tells me no one is in my area. So when I move the distance further people show up in previous distance aka my area) Bad app with bad customer care to go along with it 👍 If I could give it zero stars I definitely would.

Was trying to pay for upgrade , application rejected my credit card . However on my bank account I noticed that they charge my card , and transaction was made . But I didn't received any emails or texts or any confirmation of that . And application still doesn't work for me . No matches , wants you to buy Gold . Tons of fake profiles and spam . Waist of time and money . Will not recommend to anyone . 1 minute I posted this review they start sending me porn spam matches ... How pathetic you are .

There are severe problems when signal is spotty. I have Gold and while traveling reception may go in and out. When this happens the app behaves bizarrely while going through profiles that have already "liked" me. For example, when I "like" or "dislike" someone in my queue, the action will sometimes be applied to the person at the top of my queue instead. I have also "liked" people during poor signal and the action did not go through properly and yet I lost the person from my queue.

App has shadow penalization which get triggered for arbitrary reasons. Like I got penalized for deleting my account after not getting any matches. Doesn't stop them from accepting your money. There is no support to help you resolve issues. At this point this app is a scam. There are better apps than this that you should be trying.

title: Poetizer - Social Network for Poetry
description:
Poetizer is a social network designed for the publication, sharing and reading of poetry. Free of all visual clutter, Poetizer builds only on the most essential thing - a written word. Poetizer brings together a community of like-minded people who love poetry. It provides a safe space for truthful expression. Join Poetizer. Where poetry gets social. 

SHARE YOUR POETRY WITH OTHERS 
Create your account, save drafts and publish your poems when they're ready. Receive support and feedback from poetry lovers across the world and establish your identity on the international poetry scene.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR POEMS
Just double-click on any word in your poem and discover all the ways you can shape your poetry. Our editor is designed to meet the needs of contemporary poets. 

KEEP EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE 
Available both on website and app, all your activity is automatically synced to the online platform at Poetizer.com Enjoy all the features of the integrated platform wherever you are.  

DISCOVER NEW POETRY 
Find and read hundreds of new poems every day and follow the authors you like the most. 

COLLECT YOUR FAVORITE POEMS
Use our bookmarks to collect your favorite poems so that you can find them whenever you want.

FOCUS ONLY AT POETRY 
Our minimalist design provides a clean and distraction-free environment for your ultimate writing and reading experience.

KEEP EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE
Available both on website and app, all your activity is automatically synced to the online platform at Poetizer.com Enjoy all the features of the integrated platform wherever you are.  

DISCOVER NEW POETRY
Find and read hundreds of new poems every day and follow the authors you like the most.

COLLECT YOUR FAVORITE POEMS
Use our bookmarks to collect your favorite poems so that you can find them whenever you want.

FOCUS ONLY AT POETRY
Our minimalist design provides a clean and distraction-free environment for your ultimate writing and reading experience.
summary: For Poets & Poetry Lovers. Discover daily new poems.
developerAddress: Jungmannovo namesti 3, Prague 1, 110 00, Czech Republic, EU
recentChanges:
We are constantly working on new Poetizer app updates in order to give you the best user experience possible.

Love the app? Rate us!

comments: A good app but, could be much better if it would stop glitching. Hard to comment, give likes, but even more annoying is that you can't at times get to your OWN poems...let alone read others. I have never lost a poem, but others have...so sad. Please fix this... other than this(minor issue), it is a wonderful community with very talented, friendly writers!

The community isn't so bad but the actual experience of using the app is a hit or miss. It loads when it wants to; the same poem will show on my news feed five times in a row; there's no way to keep track of your comments or communicate with other users directly; even the notifications are problematic — they're generic alerts that just tell you to come to the app. I really wish more care was put into this app because it has the potential to be amazing.

Only been using this for 3 days but I love it. Now and then it frustrates me as it won't load things but clearing data and signing back in fixes it. Great app and great community of creative people. I've now been using this App for a few weeks. It's a lovely community of writers and poets however it's frustrating that there is no facility to "like" comments or reply to them. This leads to very disjointed responses. Such a shame as it has so much potential.

I love this app, i have met with alot of poets through this. However, there's alot of issue with it. I get alot of error messages, most of the time it won't let me copy paste my own writings into it. There for I have to write down each and everyone of them before I upload them and it takes alot of time. I hope you'll fix this issue. And just so you know, am using the latest version of this app.

Poetizer does a good job of giving you a run down of how it works, but it's also simple enough for you to figure out on your own without the help of the tutorial. It's so fun to get your poems out to the world and for people to see and review them. And people are so nice on the app from my experience, that I don't feel frightened to post anything. One of the best things is you can be whoever you want. It's not like Facebook where everyone knows that's who you really are, so it's nice.

title: Qooiver: Social Network Based on Interests
description:
Qooiver is the next-gen free social network based on relevance, where users interact on common interests, through a minimalist approach. Awesome social features and no BS, no targeting, no news feed manipulation.

Turning ON ‘post relevance’ in the social app will restrict irrelevant content from showing up on your feed. Treasure your time, see only what you need & want.

Most current social network users are being driven away by the noise and repetitive content out there. To solve these problems they are now trying to break this paradigm and strive towards relevance. We’re also trying to achieve this through #Qooiver. Find a variety of interests such as cryptocurrency news; cooking recipe finder by ingredient; history blogs; gaming news and trends; horoscopes and anything else you might be thinking of! All in one place thanks to our users and content aggregators.

★ Use Qooiver to: 

- Share photos and videos 
- Find ideas and recipes searching by ingredient
- Keep up with the latest news in crypto, history, beauty, gaming, etc.
- Post as many pictures as you like to drive the interaction and develop a community around your common interests
- Use the chat to discuss, exchange ideas and information with like-minded people
- Gain notoriety and followers by posting the most interesting content for your interests
- Follow top posters to get the best content for the things you love

★ How does Qooiver work? 

All the ‘likes’ are attributed to the initial post. This way, we can see each posts’ true value.

Qooiver has two important components that help us create relevance: the “/” tag and the ”#” tag. All content is categorized by those two tags.

The “/” tag represents your interest and provides you with the possibility to create true communities around that interest. By having people with common likes collaborate we offer the possibility for them to develop in an enjoyable manner.

The “#” tag is meant to bring more relevance to your interest by narrowing down, pinpointing to the precise aspects of that category that you enjoy or you’re more interested in.

By offering users relevant content and relieving them from classic social relationship constraints we allow them to truly express and develop. Users can join or create their own communities right from the start enjoying the desired content right away.

The “/” and “#” also allows us to provide a powerful search and filtering tool for the user to find relevant content or help them expand and find new interests..

★ Qooiver: crypto news, gaming news, cooking recipes by ingredient, history blogs, beauty news and tips, daily horoscopes, spiritual blogs and much much more! Join us on this hip social media platform.

comments: I like the concept very much. I can filter through various hashtags and narrow down my searches to quite specific results, unlike any other social networking platform. Its useful if you like to find all your content/news in just one place. The original posts keep all the votes and comments, and you can genuinely see only the best articles in your interest, at the top of your timeline. The user interface is really cool, loved the chosen design colors throughout the app.
This is a great app for filtering crypto news and it is so easy to use. Well worth downloading if you are looking for a interest based app.
It's been ages and barely anything's improved. Also, I like all the fake reviews. Very professional.
Keeps on crashed and taking much time to load a page.

cool app that uses your interests to curate your content. I ve put just /moto and /crypto up untill now, and i m loving it. easy way to have all my morning news in just one place, not having to look on 4 platforms at once.

Our mission is to help you find the type of relationship you are looking for.

What makes Hong Kong Social unique is this: You can meet people directly by watching videos of them. Meeting new people, making friends, chatting, socializing, and even dating has never been that fun!

Unlike other networks… we have video profiles! They say a picture is worth a thousand words and a video is at least a thousand pictures! We created a video based social app because you can express yourself more accurately with videos and let your personality shine through! Too shy to upload a video? Don't feel like looking at photos or videos of people and singles? Then hangout in our chat rooms and message people nearby or everywhere else right away. Chat with local people or join the world chat room and chat with people from all over the world.

title: Zoho Social
description:
Zoho Social - an all-in-one social media management tool for businesses. 

Zoho Social helps businesses manage multiple social channels, and grow an active social media presence, from one platform. 

- Capture your favorite moments, edit your best pictures, and instantly publish posts across social channels while on-the-move 
- Add posts to a publishing queue, reach out to the right audience at optimal times, and do more, with powerful scheduling features 
- Work on new posts while you're disconnected from the internet. Your saved drafts will be automatically synced once you are back online
- Monitor hashtags and keywords, discover new leads and engage with your audience in real-time
- Measure your social media performance with insights about every post

recentChanges: We've squashed a few pesky bugs in this update
comments: Super Easy! We have been using Zoho Social to schedule our social media posts across a number of networks. It is our one stop shop for all our social media interactions and activities! We also love the reporting capabilities too that can be automated to receive regular reports on a number of different metrics. The APP is also easy to use and handy for on the run random posting. Price wise they are very competitive with us getting the functionality of some very expensive prog

Honestly for the most part this app is pretty great on its functionality. I wish we as a brand could do more engagements on posts from our audience in the monitor section. However it does what it's meant to do for the most part. And that is keeping up with what is happening on all our channels.

Happy with Zoho Social ! We have been using Zoho Social for a while and below is the feedback: 1. Posting on different social platforms is a breeze namely FB, Insta, Google My Business, LinkedIn, FB Groups, Twitter and can be also be scheduled across. 2. Collaboration is very effective as I have teams across different cities. 3. A Consolidated reporting feature which provides me with specific insights and metrics on targeted audience.

I came from Buffer since their prices have gone up and their features have gone down. Zoho lets you publish to multiple profiles on the free plan and for very reasonable monthly costs, they have some great features. So far, my posts publish smoothly, the notifications are faster than my in-app notifications, and I really like how user friendly it is.

For now, I am giving ZohoSocial 5-stars. The only thing in my way so far is an interactive - simple photo resizing option. Other than that this platform is performing better than another option I jest discontinued that was 10X more expensive. Super happy about the savings.

title: SoMee.social
description: SoMee is a decentralized social media platform that allows end users to monetize all content and allows brands to gain valuable data points through a consent based advertising system without exploiting user data.  SoMee does not package or share user data, rather we allow each user to choose what information they want to share with advertisers and earn money when doing so.  This is a win/win for end users and brands.  SoMee is entirely gamified and allows users to earn staking, content and curation rewards. SoMee also combines a social media hub for streamlining posts to all social media from a single platform.  Welcome to social media redefined.

title: OnGraviti - Be Different, Be Social, Be OnGraviti
description:
OnGraviti Connects People!

OnGraviti seeks to make your online experience that much easier. We’ve combined the most important elements from social media connecting, to business networking, in just one place. Now with just a few taps, you can swap between different profiles in one consolidated app, saving you time, money, and frustration along the way.

OnGraviti contains 5 different platforms therein: My World, Dating, Social, Roommate Finder (coming soon), and Business. Therefore, you can gather business leads, date, find roommates, connect with friends and family, have followers/grow a fan base if your profile is set to public, and do everything you could ever want to do in just one app. OnGraviti keeps your dating information completely separate from the professional side of the app, and vice versa. Best of all OnGraviti is Completely AD FREE!

It’s your all-in-one solution you never knew you needed.

OnGraviti features: 

My World
Like, comment, and share posts, photos, build your followers much like you would on any social media site. With OnGraviti, this social media app is completely ad-free, which means you can finally enjoy social media engagement again.

Dating
Create a private profile that you can use to chat, date, and connect with other likeminded people. All information is kept secret and encrypted from your other OnGraviti profiles. Watch a users video bio before swiping.

Social
Connect with people based on likes, dislikes, and interests, as you create your own online community. Meet friends, make groups, schedule events, and build a family right through our app.

Roommate Finder (coming soon)
With the video biographies you can upload to each profile, find roommates for upcoming vacancies. Videos will help you gage their personality so you are able to find perfect pairings more seamlessly, and in a fraction of the typical time.

Business
Lastly, welcome to a new business app that is more intuitive than other options. Hire talent, connect with managers, and grow your business in this ad-free experience that makes it easier for everyone to get what they want at the end of the day.

We’re your new social media option. If you’re tired of the paid-for ads on social media, having to buy advertising to get your business out there, and sifting through failed dating apps that are based on nothing but looks, we’ve created a multipurpose solution with OnGraviti. 

Change your life with just one app, available in both the Apple App Store and the Google Play Store.

title: Uhive Social Network
description:
Discover the wonders of a new digital universe! Create your space today - it's FREE!

Uhive is an entirely new multi-layered social network that introduces a new dimension to the world of social media. Socialise, interact and find people across the world who share the same interests as you! Create your space [profile] under your favourite interest(s) and get rewarded based on your level of engagement! 

Be a part of the future of social networking!

What makes us stand out? 

  ● A new innovative social exploration experience allowing users to explore spaces in a more intuitive way
  ● Based on years of studying human psychology, aiming to address real human needs 
  ● Built to support virtual reality (VR) 
  ● The Grey World; a place where you can be whoever you want to be, and remain completely anonymous 
  ● A new and completely self-sustained digital economy 
  ● Uhive Token, the official currency of the Civilized and Grey Worlds, is fundamental for the transaction of products, digital assets and services 

Uhive social network is designed to mimic real-life but with built-in digital assets!

Create your own space(s): 

A 'space' defines your 'personal profile' or 'location' and holds significant value. It’s a place where you can express your thoughts, post comments and share ideas.

Own Uhive tokens: 

Uhive Token is a network-integrated digital currency that is based on blockchain and limited in supply!

The token is easy to buy using in-app purchases, PayPal, BTC or ETC. 

Create your space now… enjoy the rewards later!

We welcome all feedback

Like us, follow us and share your experience with Uhive

► Twitter - https://twitter.com/UHivesocial
► Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/UHIVESocial
► Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/uhive/

You can email us directly at: support@uhive.com

www.uhive.com

title: Elyments – Social Media Simplified
description:
Elyments is a comprehensive social networking app that is literally a one-stop-app for everything you might need. Connect and converse with friends, share updates, network with like-minded people, discover interests, make seamless voice and video calls, and much more with Elyments.

Take picture-perfect images

Unleash your photography skills with our meticulously designed in-app camera. Create and post timeless moments to share real-time updates with your circle. Take your photography game to the next level with inbuilt filters and AR characters.

Endless conversations

Cut the distance by keeping in touch with friends from across the globe through lag-free, instant messages. Have individual or group chats from within the app and keep the conversations going!

Stay updated

Keep up-t0-date with the activities in your circle and also stay abreast with the latest events and news from around the world. Choose from a variety of topics and get updates and breaking news for the interests of your choice.

Keep your data private and secure

Elyments is a well-thought and indigenously designed app to ensure that you make the most of social media while keeping your data safe and secure. With end-to-end encryption, Elyments ensures that your data remains safe from prying eyes. All our servers are hosted in India, thus providing a fast and breezy experience.

Realizing a one-world family

Elyments has been entirely built in India by a young team of passionate people who firmly believe in the ancient Indian concept of Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam or a one-world family. Though made in India, Elyments is a global platform for people of all walks of life to come together, converse, learn, and grow together.

title: Meetup: Find events near you
description:
Get connected with local groups and events so you can meet new people and try new things. Use Meetup to explore your city, build your career, find support, get out of your comfort zone, or pursue a passion. Download the app to discover events hosted by local groups, or start a group to schedule your own events.

Discover local events and groups
- Get matched with events based on your interests, from book clubs to free yoga and more
- Explore groups and events by category, search by keyword, or see what’s popular in your area
- Save events you’re interested in and revisit them later
- Use discussions and messaging to stay in touch with the people you meet
- Easily switch between locations to find great experiences no matter where you are

Start a group
- Host your own events by creating a group for whatever you’re into
- Watch your community grow as your group is recommended to interested people
- Easily personalize and schedule events on-the-fly, and manage your group from anywhere
- Keep the momentum going between events by sharing photos and using discussions and messaging to connect with the people in your group

Get in touch with questions or suggestions: androiddev@meetup.com

In order to recommend Meetup events that are close to you and show your distance from a scheduled event, we use your device's precise location (GPS and network-based).

comments: Meetup is great heaps of knowledge and help within stranger interaction on different topics within the community. I find the app good as it gives detail on the Meetup, messages and questions from people attending the Meetup and a rating after you attend the meetup letting other people on quality of the meetup. One thing that is a bugger on this app is applying your interests to your profile. For the meetups which are of interest to be emailed. Otherwise i have to search manually.

Although I am having trouble with some of the settings and navigating and finding out what email address I have .(the platform is somewhat difficult to manage on my android.) ... the intent is fantastic and it's helped bring together so many great people with like-minded needs and those who might have trouble meeting up out socially..

Buggy, unreliable, misses the point. The comment system in the events is amateurish to be kind, easily breaking a conversation. The application keeps on trying to clutter your main view with all meetup on your zone. Let's be clear about one thing I KNOW what I LIKE. I will search accordingly, mind your own business. It is the Facebook of the meeting applications, you do not wabt to use it, but all your frirbds are there.

Very active community with a lot of different groups for a lot of different interests. The app itself is also a good translation of most of the desktop website functionality into something that makes sense on mobile. It has some small UI/UX issues that sometimes slow down the experience, but nothing too annoying or confusing.

I guess the app works fine, but trying to upload one photo in the app or on the website truly SUCKS. Sometimes the upload works and sometimes it doesn't. Not sure why this would be an ongoing issue since our lives are lived through photos. Please fix.

title: Chat Rooms - Find Friends
description:
Chat and find new friends now with ChatGum. Our chat rooms will help you stay connected and discover new friends nearby or around the world. 


Find and connect with people who share similar interests.
The ChatGum community is organized by topic specific chat rooms. Whatever you are passionate about, we have a chat room for you. After you find a room you like, you can start chatting with like-minded people. Every message you send to the chat room will be read by the group currently online in the room.  For a more personal touch, send a private message!

Express yourself and show the world who you really are.
Interact with people in chat by moving around with your avatar. Use colorful and animated emojis to express your feelings without words.  

Sending text messages using ChatGum's Private Messenger is fast and fun.
Use our private messaging service to text new friends or keep in touch with family. Messenger delivers all messages instantly, without needing to refresh. However, if your friends are offline, you can still send them messages with fun emojis. They will be receive a notification and can text back later. 

Engage in in-depth discussions in our forum.
Sometimes conversations are best in message board format. Each chat room has their own forum, in which friends can discuss topics they are interested in. Our forums are a great way to start long conversations  without needing to online at the same time. Simply pick a topic, and decide to post a message, emoji or participate in a discussion.  You can also like messages to show your support. Liking a message will also save it so you can read later. 

Be more social and share things you like with people worldwide.
ChatGum is a great way to grow your social network. Customize your profile, upload a selfie and fill out your bio with cool emojis to show the world what you are interested in. You can gauge your popularity by how many users have liked your profile.

This chat app is 100% Free, and does not charge for unlimited chatting or texting. All you need is a mobile phone or tablet with a stable internet connection, (WiFi, 3G, 4G or LTE ), and you can start chatting now.

Connect with ChatGum!
Follow us on Instagram - https://instagram.com/make.friends
Follow us on Twitter - https://twitter.com/MobileChatApp
Like us on Facebook - https://facebook.com/ChatGum

ChatGum is only available for users ages 13 and over. Please review our terms of use, and safety statement in the private policy link below.

comments: At first it was great chatting but then when you know that there are people working across the globe. The down side is that I contacted the supports team via email and really no reply to my profile. I've notice that when I chat to someone and try to look up their profile I see myself instead 😑😇 and the other thing is I can't create boards or reply on to someone's 😑. They don't care about making their app function properly, they only want our money from buying VIPs.

title: WildFyre - Social media built for you, by you
description:
Social media built for you, by you

What is WildFyre?
WildFyre is a new Social Network App which makes Social Media fair again. 
We give everyone the chance to make their opinions, ideas and stories heard, to discuss freely and get viral. There is no unfair prioritization of accounts. All users are treated the same.

WildFyre is without Gatekeepers
Gatekeepers ruined Social Media. So we removed them.

WildFyre is a Naturally Viral
Your success on WildFyre is based upon how you present yourself. So how will you?

WildFyre lets you be Anonymous
Want to play devil's advocate? Whisper a secret? We have you covered!

WildFyre is Open Source
We believe in transparency, that's why we openly publish our source code. Want to help? Join us to create a fair open source and non-profit Social Network!

WildFyre is Non-Profit
We put you first when we make business decisions. Want to be heard? Join us to create the best best Social Media!

Features of the WildFyre Social Network App
✔ Share | Post a card with your opinion, idea, story, picture, or meme. 
✔ Discover | Stumble upon new opinions and ideas by other users.
✔ Discuss | Communicate with our community about a card.
✔ Ignite | Like a card? Want to make it viral? Ignite it and let it spread like wildfire.
✔ Extinguish | Don't like a card? Stop it from spreading further.

Who are the people behind WildFyre?
We are former users of Social Networks and Social Media apps like StumbleUpon, Plag - Information Network, Candid, Imzy, and SOLA, who come together to make Social Media fair again.

So, I cannot login or refresh the app at all. Is anyone else experiencing this? It's a bit frustrating as I do not want to lose my chats and whatnot. Can Devs do something about this please?

Would have given 5 stars a few weeks ago, until it stopped working in Secure Folder after the update. Contacted support, and this seems to be a feature rather than a bug. I need to keep the app in secure folder, b/c all my pics are there. The discreet logo and pin are not secure enough. Grindr still shows up on list of apps. Cancelling subscription.

I liked this site at first but now it like freezes. Tried to update for 3 month special. Can't do that. I'm close to uninstalling it and move on. But it's also first local site I've found with locals. Moved here to river country farmtown from ,Phoenix Az. Puts this area to shame your 40yrs behind here. 1 more attempt then adios.

All in one app, does not take up too much space but the screen gets blurry and goes in and out a lot. It is also not letting me upload pictures. When I try to use Twitter, it will not load. I tried going through Google and loading it that way but the screen was stuck and would not take me to the home page where my messages and notifications are. It is a great space saving concept, however, if these few things could be fixed it would be better. Now to just remember all my former usernames, passwords & the email accounts they're connected to. I'm hoping to soon get on all my former social sites & this looks to be a huge help!

title: Glose - Social ebook Reader
description:
The next-generation READING APP that makes reading AWESOME with features to keep you engaged and motivated. Pick a book in our choice of 1 million, start reading any book for free, connect with other readers and share notes, highlights, and conversation - and become a better reader. 

Build your bookshelf in seconds : Create a free reader profile, organize your books, create lists. 
Browse our ebookstore : 1 million ebooks in all categories. Best sellers, fiction, non fiction, young adult, business, education etc... with great discounts and free classics. 
Start any book for free! One touch and you’re into any book for free. Read up to 10% of the content before deciding to pursue and purchase the book. Also, upload an import your own epubs from Dropbox, your desktop of anywhere else!
Read anywhere, anytime, online and offline. Glose stores your current reads so you can read them offline, in the bus, subway, in the depths of a mysterious forest or a far away galaxy.
Join the Community : see what other people are reading, recommending, highlighting, and annotating. 
Read with your friends! Create reading groups to read with your friends and share highlights and annotations. Shared annotations in the margins of the text make reading more engaging and exciting. Post a note and see what other readers think. 
Start an online book club! Create a group, pick a name and image, invite people and choose books : you’ve got your online book club read to go - around the world!
Make reading beautiful : create beautiful quote cards from the books you read. Choose a sentence that inspires you, choose a background photo, and share the quote card on social media. 

More about Glose : 

Reading for better learning : our unique features makes your reading more conducive to text analysis, memorization, and study. Glose is used in leading schools and universities to power distribution of reading material and discussion around text. 

Our bookstore features the works of Malcolm Gladwell, Walter Isaacson, Stephen King, John Green, Paulo Coelho, James Patterson, E.L. James, Suzanne Collins, Danielle Steel, David Baldacci, Janet Evanovich, Nora Roberts, Dan Brown, Dean Koontz, John Grisham, George R.R Martin, and many more !  
• Read popular FREE ebooks by classic authors : Moby Dick, Alice in Wonderland, Sherlock Holmes, The Art of War, by Sun Tzu, The Marvelous Land of Oz, Tales from Shakespeare, Romeo & Juliet, Pride & Prejudice and more.  
 
On Glose, reading becomes social. You can highlight your favorite quotes with one touch, archive them, share them on social networks, and annotate them. So join our community of readers who read, share, and discuss the books they love! 

Glose provides the most powerful reading experience online. 
• Customise your reading settings to personalise your experience  : fonts, spacing, page structure, background color (might mode and more).
• Always pick up your reading at the right page thanks to automatic synchronisation of your Reading activity on all devices.  
• Make new friends through books 


So what are you waiting for ? Don’t miss the inspiring conversations happening every day in Glose, and Download our app !

Connect with us on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/GloseApp) 
Follow Glose on Twitter (https://twitter.com/Glose)

comments: I am not sure why Harlequin chose this app. It doesn't book mark, you can't filter and it doesn't automatically mark your books as read. I have to manually go back and mark all the books I've previously read. This is quite cumbersome and time consuming. To me these are very key features for an ereader. I preferred the previous app.
This book reader is too slow to update pages. I sometimes have to wait for seconds for the page to update. That's totally unacceptable. If they could speed up the page update I'd be a lot happier?
As a Harlequin Ebook subscriber I needed to get the app to read my books. It is not one of the better options as you cannot search your own bookshelf so trying to find a specific book is tedious.

CRASHY. Not intuitive. I spent ten minutes trying to figure out how to set bookmarks -- not comments or highlights, just bookmarks -- to no avail. If there's a way to set my entire library to default to private/"only me", I haven't yet found it. Nor is there a way to mark multiple books at once as "already read". I had to "shelve" them one by one -- no small task when over 80 of my books are already read and the app repeatedly crashed after shelving two or three books. Overall? Unimpressed.
Awful still can't access books or change font or background. Freezes often. Worst ereader I have ever used on my tablet - beyond frustrating!

title: Hootsuite: Schedule Posts for Twitter & Instagram
description:
Manage and schedule posts to multiple social media profiles on Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram and more, all from one app – Hootsuite!

Hootsuite is free for up to 3 social network accounts and has over 15 million users. It is the top app for Android to help you manage your business on social media.

Hootsuite allows you to:
* Publish and share photos to all your social networks at once
* Manage multiple social network accounts on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, and LinkedIn
* Schedule a post to Facebook or a tweet to Twitter to be sent at a later time or day
* AutoSchedule messages to automatically post them at the best time of day
* Monitor your brand on Twitter and Facebook
* Receive optional notifications when people mention your brand or talk about keywords you follow
* Shorten links with Ow.ly and track click-through stat report analytics

Hootsuite for Android complements your account on the Hootsuite web platform. You can easily add your social network accounts such as Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn and Instagram to your Hootsuite account to get started.

Simple, efficient, and powerful, Hootsuite for Android allows you to:
* Tweet from multiple Twitter accounts or schedule tweets for Twitter accounts.
* Post to Facebook Profiles and Pages or schedule Facebook posts. 

Get the top app to build your audience, manage Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and LinkedIn from anywhere and tie analytics back to your goals.

Sign up for Hootsuite for free: http://hootsuite.com

If you experience any issues or want to give us feedback, tweet to us @Hootsuite_Help. We're happy to help!

Questions or feedback?
http://feedback.hootsuite.com/forums/40828-hootsuite-for-android

Twitter: @hootsuite
Facebook: http://facebook.com/hootsuite

comments: Love it! Used the free version for years & it was plenty to run our small church's social media. But now that I run multiple accounts, I upgraded to the paid version & it has been WORTH it. It saves me soooo much time!
It's the best on a PC or laptop. It's not the friendliest on tablets or phones. I have found some workarounds which is a little annoying so my rating is a little generous. I'm hoping for fixes.

So far I'm not happy with the app, in the beginning it was working fine, but after a week or 2 the scheduler did not work. Whenever I wanted to post smth on IG it would get stuck on 'open in instagram' which is very annoying to say it lightly.
Excellent on mobile, sluggish in desktop. Layout can be a little bit confusing but you get used to it.

As a post scheduler it works well. I wish it had some of the other functions that you get when going through a desktop browser. Being able to look at at your analytics and data from a mobile app would be useful. I think many social media professionals and business users would want to be able to look at the analytics numbers while on the move.

comments: Pretty good for a free app! Wish you could color in or add background to text boxes so it's not all one background. This app is ok. The interface is easy to learn and there are alot of things that are good about it. The reason I say its ok is because the app makers are pushing you to pay for the no ad verison. If people are posting alot and want to make their post more personable and the right image size for their social media platform than use this app. Just get ready for alot of ads

First time ever making my own post and memes. This is so easy to use. I don't care for the "ready made" post/pics, but they're not hard to find on fb or I use from my gallery. title: myCrew: #1 Social Fitness App
description:
Welcome to myCrew, a free social fitness platform that connects active people to local workouts and each other.

We believe that fitness is more fun with friends. From London to Los Angeles, Barcelona to Boston and San Francisco to Sydney… plus many more, we are creating a global community, comprised of like-minded people who share the same passion for fitness. We are rapidly growing and adding new cities around the world every week! 	

When you download myCrew, you’ll select your city, browse activities hosted by local trainers, gyms and communities. From running and yoga to bootcamps and HIIT workouts, join the activities that support your goals and chat with fellow myCrew members.  

We want to help build fitness communities who understand that staying fit makes us stronger both in body and in mind. The only thing better than the endorphins you experience whilst working out is doing it with people who make you feel welcomed, inspired, and ready to lace up for the next challenge.

Ready to find your Crew? Download myCrew for free now. 

P.S. Let us know if you have any questions or feel free to leave a comment about how to make myCrew even better. You can contact us at hello@mycrew.com.

A little more about us:

We are: a team of impassioned runners, lifters and movers with a love for the outdoors, fitness and keeping active! 

We believe: that fitness is more fun with friends, that’s why myCrew focuses on activities as well as encouraging people to connect with each other. 

We built myCrew: to help create a happier world through more engaged people, every day.

title: Parler
description:
Parler is a non-biased, free speech social media focused on protecting user’s rights. Create your own community and enjoy content and news in in real time. Apply moderation tools to filter content. Empower yourself to control your social experience and be a verified member of the community! 

Highlights:

Discover sports, news, politics, and entertainment 
Engage with official statements and thoughts from community leaders
Experience dynamic media — like photos, and GIFs
Echo, Share, Vote and Comment on Parlays 
Debate and Moderate
Get caught up on news headlines and videos
Be apart of the viral experience
Find out who started following you
Discover which of your Parlays were votes or echo'd
Respond to comments or echos
Private message your clique 
Share Parlays and other media
Customize your profile with a photo, description, location, and background photo
Tell the world what you need them to know!

They stayed in constant communication until the problem was resolved. They are a 5 star organization. Don't listen to the mob hatred. Parler is awesome! Tons of great people and support!

2 weeks ago after update, notifications no longer work. Pretty disappointed when people engage with your post respond, but you have no clue which is damn useless unless you're only there to not engage with users. Already submit complaints about it and they go to usual app user preferences. I'll update this after notifications start working correctly but until then this app is broken for people who wish for actual engagement.

I have tried 50x to try to get back on to Parler. If you forget your password...you are screwed. Their support SUCKS. LIRERALLY SUCKS. it never sends you an email to change password, nothing. If you try to open a new account with a new number, even THAT sucks. Once you forget your password or email, you are screwed for life.

Have not been able to toggle between my accounts for 2 months now. @Sandrakayward5 is totally useless except to use the user feature to access my other account @Chicken_littlee. Have only limited access to @Chicken_littlee account as i can no longer log into that account. Have notified @parlersupport & @john several times over the past two months to please look into this. Have given up hope that anyone there is able or willing to fix this mess.

I used to like this app bcuz in it's infancy it was giving Americans their voice back on social media but now it's been a long time & several things are dumb like link sharing & link following. They don't work. How can you verify the source? All you have is a bunch of lonely people sharing political Memes. It's sad.

title: Social Deal - The best deals
description:
Looking for a nice restaurant, relaxing wellness break, exciting day out at the amusement park or a comfy hotel stay, all with a discount? In the Social Deal app you will find new offers every day. There is something for everyone!

ADVANTAGES OF OUR APP
✔️The best deals: discover the best restaurant deals, hotel deals, wellness deals, amusement park deals and much more.
✔️Download for free: download our app for free and never miss a (local) daily offer.
✔️Always a discount:always benefit from a nice discount ranging from 30 to 70%
✔️All deals are at your fingertips:find deals in your area and discover what other cities in the Netherlands, Belgium and Germany have to offer!
✔️Favourites: save your favourite deals to always have them at your fingertips.

💙 Via Social Deal you can find deals with discounts of up to 70% in the Netherlands, Belgium and Germany.

So at the end, if you want to put a little effort like a minute or two to save 10, 20 or even more euros, then this is the app you have been looking for!

I don't like the fine print that comes with most of the deals. When you are choosing a restaurant for example, you don't want or even expect two pages of fine print with all that is included, excluded, booking procedures and more. That fine print is acceptable when you are signing a contract for a loan at a bank. Not for an evening out at a restaurant, bar, ... It might be for others that are OK with this, but it's not for me. It only limits my freedom.

Great app to find local deals for restaurants, outings, beauty and more in the Netherlands. I especially like the deals for restaurants as you get to try a nice menu in a new restaurant often for half the price. Usually it's places you otherwise haven't heard of or might think of when going out for dinner or lunch. App is well designed and offers all information about a deal, allows for payment online and set a reservation at the venue in one go.
Easy to work with. Very clear what you get when you buy the ticket. Easy to make reservations straight away and you will get enough confirmation about buys or the like.
It is awesome for nice outgoings with this app! The only thing that is disappointing that you need to do for a specific date!

title: UK Social - British Date Video App to Meet Singles
description:
Millions of straight, gay and lesbian singles count on us to find the man or woman they want to date. Get the app to start chatting, and exploring the best group of British singles in online dating. No longer you need to fish in a shallow pond:  meet the right girl or guy for you on UK Social. The UK Social dating app of course allows you to search your local area and surrounding and nearby places. There are also great single member profiles to be found, as well as plenty of opportunities to strike up a conversation. 

Our mission is to help you find the type of relationship you are looking for.

What makes UK Social unique is this: You can meet people directly by watching videos of them. Meeting new people, making friends, chatting, socializing, and even dating has never been that fun!

Unlike other networks… we have video profiles! They say a picture is worth a thousand words and a video is at least a thousand pictures! We created a video based social app, because you can express yourself more accurately with videos and let your personality shine through! Too shy to upload a video? We have photos too but the videos are much more exciting! 

Don't feel like looking at photos or videos of people and singles? Then hangout in our chat rooms and message people nearby or everywhere else right away. Chat with local people or join the world chat room and chat with people from all over the world. We are also introducing our newest feature Flash Chat. With flash chat, you send pictures, videos, or even audio clips that will delete itself forever after you set the timer. It’s a really fun and cool feature. 

Love to meet new British people, make friends or find a date to hangout with tonight? It's easy! You can start by seeing video clips of singles and when you like someone, just click the heart. If they like you back, we will connect both of you. Want to help break the ice? Send them a ‘Hi’! You can send unlimited messages, videos and photos to each other. Finding a date, meeting new friends, chatting, dating has never been so easy. And best of all, it's FREE! 

Our Features?
- group social chat rooms
- private inbox with photo, video and audio
- make fans (people that like you)
- or friends (people you like back)
- video and photo profiles
- tags system in profiles
- FREE way to meet new friends

Why use UK Social?
- meet new people
- make new friends locally or globally
- generate fans 
- see funny and interesting videos of people
- local chat room, world chat room, and many others

title: Symphony: The Music Social Network
description:
Symphony is the Music Social Network with Music Stories. Share Music Stories out of a collection of over 45 Million Songswith your friends and use exciting Music-Related Stickers. Explore Music Shared by people all over the world.
Music Match will match you with people around the globe with similar music taste as yours.
Ask for music-questions and recommendations, which can be answered by users all over the globe.
Play the exciting daily Music Quiz and compete with users globally on the Leaderboard. 
Get recommendations from the disruptive AI enabled Personal Music Assistant, Beat that suggests you songs according to your mood, feelings, activities and much more. 
Directly share songs with your friends using the Music Chat Feature. 
Listen to your local MP3 songs with an intuitive Music Player which has an in-built Audio Visualizer . Earn Badges that recognize your Music Awesomeness!

Getting bored of your own playlists? Download Symphony to explore a whole new Music World. 


Features:

 ★ Music Stories: Search for a song out of 45 million tracks and post 30s Song Stories on the wall. You can also directly share a song from your Music Streaming App. 

 ★ Music Questions/Recommendations: Ask or answer a Music Question/ Recommendation Request. The answers can be Music Stories only! Get answers from users all over the world!

 ★ Exciting Stickers: “Music Speaks, When Words Simply Fail”. Use our awesome stickers along with the Music Stories to express your feelings and emotions. 

 ★ Explore Music: Explore what your friends are listening to and discover awesome new music from people all over the globe!

 ★ Watch Full YouTube Videos: Watch the entire YouTube Music Video on Symphony itself!

 ★ Play Music Quizzes: Play the Exciting Music Quizzes. The Music Quizzes are updated daily for you to enjoy and answer intriguing questions.

 ★ Compete on the Leaderboard: Ace the Music Quizzes and compete with your friends and users all over the world on the Leaderboard!

 ★ AI enabled Personal Music Assistant: Beat is your Personal DJ. It is your personal Music Bot which understands you and your real time needs and suggests you music. Be it the activity you are pursuing, a specific genre or the emotions you are going through, Beat will talk back to you, understand you and suggest you a list of songs for your needs. That’s not it! It has a plethora of other features like Trivia and Jokes, which will keep you entertained. 

 ★ Directly Chat and Share Songs with your friends: Using the Music Chat feature, chat and share songs personally with your friends!

 ★ Intuitive Local MP3 Player: Symphony has an awesome MP3 music player with an in-built Audio Visualizer  to play all your local MP3 songs. The waves on the Music Player move according the beat of the music playing.

 ★ Music Badges: Symphony has a set of Cool Badges to recognize your taste of music. Earn new badges and boast them as a proof of your Music Awesomeness!

 ★ Search Feature: Search for your friends in the app to follow them, message them and listen to their shared music.

 ★ Trending Feature: Discover trending songs shared by users all over the world.

 ★ Playlist Feature: When you love a song, you find on Symphony, add it to your Playlist. These Music Stories save to your profile so that you could listen to them whenever you want to.

 ★ Profile Feature: Edit your profile to add your DP and music story. You can also make your profile private. Follow your friends to discover the songs they are listening to.

Symphony aims to break every barrier that stands in the way of sharing music and makes music sharing absolutely effortless! It believes that music is a medium of expression of one’s feeling and it transcends all barriers!

Visit: www.symphonyapp.xyz to know more!

title: Wishbone -  Compare Anything
description:
Wishbone is your home for comparing social content. Every morning you receive a new "Daily Dozen", which is a series of 12 pop culture-based questions with two distinct choices. If you complete all 12, then you get a "Nightly Dozen" too!! You pick a side and then you can see how your friends voted. It's a quick and fun start to each morning, giving you a little bit of knowledge about what’s buzzing around the world. We cover humor, fashion, celebrities, sports, music and pretty much anything that you want to talk about.

Now with Community Feed!! - Get 20x the questions every day! 

Also - Create your own Wishbone to share with your friends. If it's really great, we'll feature it in the app for the whole community to vote on.

title: Hornet - Gay Social Network
description:
Your Hornet Profile is a portrait of you. It displays posts from the moments of your life, showcasing you and your interests.  Inviting guys to connect with you in a meaningful way - based on who you are, and what you’re passionate about.

The Hornet Feed is all about connecting you to your community. Through trends and stories, there is always a conversation to be had - making interacting with other guys easy by liking and commenting on their posts, or starting a conversation through chat.

Discover all the fun and fabulous of the gay community with Hornet’s acclaimed editors, thousands of community leaders, your friends, and the guy next door.

Whether you’ve just come out or are ready to join in - Hornet gives you immediate access to over 25 million guys and is only a download away.

■ CONNECT
PROFILES are rich portraits of yourself and others featuring photos and posts giving a fuller picture of you and those you want to connect with
CONNECTING is easy – liking and commenting on posts, and sending heartstings makes for quick introductions
CHAT with guys about mutual interests based on profiles that show you who they are and allow them to see who you are
FOLLOW your friends and anyone you want to stay connected with to see their posts, pictures, and videos on their feed

■ DISCOVER
FILTERS enable you to find exactly who you’re looking for and where you can find them
EXPLORE the guys in your neighborhood or anywhere around the globe
HASHTAGS allow you to discover other guys who share the same interests to make a connection

■ JOIN
JOIN over 25 million users on Hornet across the globe
BE A PART of discussions with Community Leaders on current topics and learn about the hottest trends all curated by Hornet’s team of editors and a worldwide network of influencers
MEET anyone anytime - there’s always someone online

■ SHARE
THE FEED features posts by guys you follow, guys nearby, influencers, and guys we think you’ll want to connect with
POSTS reflect you and your interests allowing others to respond to everything you post

■ SAFETY
PRIVACY is at the heart of Hornet – it’s designed by the gay community, for the gay community, built with privacy front and center
MODERATORS and staff of Hornet ensure the community is a safe space for you to express yourself
SUPPORT is free and always available 24/7

title: SNAC – Social Media, Messenger, Groups & Rewards
description:
SNAC is a social media built on blockchain technology where the people are rewarded in points for the quality content they create. SNAC deviates from the traditional business models where content-based revenue is targeted to a few individuals. It is structured in a way that all participants of the service can be rewarded fairly.

Key Features
■ Create various kinds of content using text, photos, and videos.
■ Provide a powerful search tool to easily find their friends or groups using hashtags.
■ Provide the first of its kind, “content betting”, feature where people can bet on their favorite content of the week.
■ Allow users to earn rewards in the form of points for various activities (e.g. when their content gets liked by others or when they win a “bet”). These points can be used to play games within SNAC, to buy coupons for various items, and to drink coffee at various stores. 
■ Protect the original content of users but leveraging blockchain’s value as an immutable ledger.

※ Access Permission

[Required]
- Storage space: Storage is used to transfer or store photos, videos, and files on the device.
- Phone Number: Phone numbers are required to authenticate user accounts. 
- Contact List: Contact information from your address book is collected to connect you to your friends.

[Optional]
- Camera: To take photos and/or record videos.
- Location: SNAC utilizes location information to allow users to find places, connect with friends, participate in location-based events, and more. 

* You can still use the app even if you choose to not opt-in. 

For inquiries and help, please contact us at:
info@sigmachain.net

title: SocialPilot: Social Media Tool
description:
SocialPilot’s app helps you publish, report, manage, and engage on social across various platforms - Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Google My Business, Pinterest, Instagram, Tumblr and VK.

SocialPilot’s following capabilities fulfill all your social media marketing needs (whether you are a professional or a part of a team):

- Connect upto 100 social media profiles, pages and groups
- Share up to 1000 posts/day and queue up to 10,000 posts
- Add up to 10 team members, set their roles, share access for post approvals, Social Inbox, etc.
- Share and schedule content while surfing the internet with browser extensions for Chrome, Safari, and Firefox
- Connect and manage your clients’ social accounts without exchanging their account credentials; control their access of creating and approving posts, viewing replies on Social Inbox, etc.
- Schedule up to 500 text and image posts in bulk
- Get actionable insights with analytics reports for - Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook, Pinterest, and Google My Business
- Never run out of things to say on social with curated content and RSS feed automation
- Reply to posts, messages, and comments on your Facebook Pages in real time with Social Inbox

This powerful social media scheduling and marketing app also allows you to:

• Craft & schedule posts using text, images, links, videos
• Reshare and reschedule your delivered posts
• Group multiple accounts together for easy scheduling and sharing
• Benefit from a user-friendly interface
• Receive notifications when your posts generate an error

Sign-up for SocialPilot right away: http://socialpilot.co/

Connect with us:
Support: support@socialpilot.co
Twitter: https://twitter.com/socialpilot_co
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/socialpilot.co
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/socialpilot

title: KARMA | Social Media For Good
description:
KARMA is social media for good. KARMA is social media designed for those who create the value, to actually earn it. Users are incentivized to do good, share positive & cool content and receive KARMA when their content is upvoted. 

No fake shadow profiles. No stealing and selling your data to 3rd parties. Build on EOS, KARMA is aiming to provide a new, decentralized, social network for the people. 

Users earn KARMA tokens for every like they receive as well as staking rewards for KARMA that's powered up. The more KARMA Power you have, the more KARMA others earn from your likes on their posts.

comments: Good app overall but I keep getting an error for uploading. It needs a ton of improvement. Too many bugs.
Well this is the worst app I ever had on my phone. Nothing works and it's so slow. I'm literally afraid that my phone will die because this app! Please fix your bugs, that is really unprofessional
I can't get through the validation process. It says i have to try again later, always repeating the same error for weeks. I tried email and facebook too. But it still shows the same problem.
Great because of monnneyyyy!🤣😂 Seriouly guys it good, it take some time to load thing but its ok for me cause im used to it I HOPE you guys fix it

title: HearMeOut - Voice Social Network
description:
Discover rising talent, listen to Musicians, News, Celebrities, Comedians, Politicians, Poets, Tech and much more... 

Share your own voice with the world - record whatever you want, add images and voice changer effects. 

Easily share your posts on your other social networks, create Voice-Tweets, and bring your Facebook images to life.

🔷 Features 

★  Record what's on your mind and share with friends or the world
★  Built-in voice changer to make your voice even more unique 
★  Add images to your posts and capture moments
★ Create Voice Memes and tell a story
★  Listen To Your Feed – Hear your favorite people, friends and celebrities 
★  Invite your friends from Facebook, Twitter, and your Address Book
★  Comment, like, repost, and share your voice posts on your social networks
★  The only social network you can safely use on the go! 
★  FORD Owners: Sync HearMeOut with your car Entertainment System

comments: I think I missed the peak. Everybody seems to have stopped producing content about a year ago. It's hard to tell though as the posts are not dated. The app needs a few upgrades : 1) Dated posts and comments 2) Voice respond in threads to encourage real dialog 3) Ability to pause and restart recordings 4) allow me to use my keyboard

What I'd like to see in the next update: 1. Broadcast time and date stamp 2. Listen # (not just "like" and "comment" #) 3. Pic with Twitter shares 4. Functioning Instagram sharing (currently crashes app when used)
My account is saved on the app but for some reason I have to sign up again and I can't sign up because that account already exists.
When I first got it, it was fine. It worked perfectly. But now It kicks me out everytime I go on it.
it crash quite often it annoys me because its always happen in the middle of recording

title: Tomlibo: Social Media and Small Business App
description:
Create & discover beautiful content. Make money online by selling products & services you love. Build your brand. Become an influencer. Connect with the people you care about. It’s really everything you love online.

Tomlibo is your Social Platform for everything. It is your Brand.  It is your Store.  It is your  Business App. 

Tomlibo lets you leverage your digital network and help you create active or passive income .

TOMLIBO FOR ALL

- Create personal or business page.
- Connect with friends/family/customers.
- Post, share, like - photos, videos, links & news.
- Multi-lingual translator with 120+ languages.
- In-app photo editor with filters, emoji, stickers etc.
- Post privacy with close friends, followers, friends etc.
- Publish blogs to build your own publishing channel.
- Get local & global news update and share it with your network.
- Super-fast encrypted messenger with group chat.
- Catch up with trending headlines, articles, gossips & stories from around the globe.

TOMLIBO FOR BUSINESS

* Your office in your pocket. 
* All the tools you need to run your small business.
* Spread your business, grow your customers and get more sales with Tomlibo.
* All-in-one platform; sell & engage like never before. 
*Switch to Business Page and get access to any of the tools to sky rocket your sales. 
* We offer FREE 7 Day TRIAL to test drive any of the tools.

Invoice Payment
Tomlibo makes it easy for small business owners & self employed to create & send professional invoices on the go, and get paid faster. It’s Fast, Secure and Simple. 

*Take care of business on the spot. 
*Create and send invoices instantly.
*Track invoices sent, opened and when they're overdue.
*Create instant quotes/estimates.
*Send unlimited invoices.
*Create unlimited clients.
*Unlimited appointments scheduling.
*Auto reminders & notifications.
*Auto Syncing across web & app.
*Accept PayPal/Cash/Credit & Debit Cards/Bank Transfer.
*Advanced reporting and multiple tax settings.
*Get paid faster and stay organised.

Online Bookings
Start scheduling your appointments & take bookings online with Tomlibo.
Make money doing what you love.
Be faster, smarter and more productive.

*Online booking tools. 
*List unlimited services. 
*Add price list & packages. 
*Take offline bookings. 
*Manage work schedules. 
*About us, policy & team pages. 
*Review rating tools. 
*Auto booking reminders & notifications. 
*Customer & staff management.
*Appointment scheduling.
*Advanced reporting & insights.

Tomlibo online booking system is suitable for beauty, spa, salon, dentists, garages or any other businesses who offers services to their customers.
  
Online Store
*You got the product and we got the platform.
*Everything you need to start an online store and sell online.
*No domain, hosting, fixing template needed – Save $$$$
*Your Tomlibo store is as good as a shop from top ecommerce platforms & it’s FREE.
*Get your store link as tomlibo.com/mystore.
*All the works are already done for you – JUST ADD YOUR ITEMS & SELL. 
*Make money selling drop shipping items from tons of suppliers.

Whether you have one item to sell or thousands, you could be a small timer or a big timer on selling stuffs online or you could be just thinking of starting – Tomlibo has perfect solutions for any timers. We offer you 3 different solutions;

1)	Sell on local marketplace with Chat & Meet. (FREE)
2)	Sell on local marketplace with Chat, Meet & PayPal. ($35/year)
3)	Open a Premium Online Store & sell anywhere with PayPal, Stripe. (2% Fee)

For more info visit tomlibo.com/business.

Take the first step. Download Tomlibo App and get started on your journey today.

Please feel free to give us any suggestions/feedback via our in-app feedback form or here.

Thank you.
